review_text: We have had the app for over a month now. We have had multiple issues with the app. The chat service is there but not able to resolve most issues . They have to be escalated and then may get a delayed response. We have had issues since the launch of our subscription that has still not been resolved. I would be prepared for issues if you have a more than a few subscribers.
Great app with awesome support. Quick to answer my questions anytime I reach out. Lots of Customization options. Thanks Priyanka for helping make my store checkout user friendly.
Great app, generally easy to use, lots of functionality. Excelent service (especially Aryan) that's right in the app, and quite responsive!
I was having trouble installing it, then reached out to customer service. Carter helped me along with answering some of my questions regarding subscription. thank you so much!
Great customer service. So easy to use, and analytics are fantastic.  Super simple to set up. I'd recommend it to anyone with a consumable product, and I will use it again... for sure.
We are very thankful with Carter, our manager on bold suscriptions. Thank you very much for the service and attention.

Fantastic app for our subscription service. Easy to use, with plenty of features and customisation options allowing our customers to modify their subscriptions each week. Stands out from the competitors due to top notch customer service, in particular from Sarah who answered all questions and queries, along with helping to migrate our business over to Bold. Highly recommended!
Priyanka and Charles are the best. Great service. Quick results! I just downloaded the app and asked for help during the free trial. They were quick to help and delivered results!

I give 5 stars the customer service, but overall the app is a band aid for subscription use.  Its a little confusing and we have had customers get double charged multiple times b/c there were rules that we didn't know about. Also they charge a fee per transaction on top of the credit card fees so it gets expensive.
Naman was quick with the answers I needed. Super helpful with getting our Bold Subscriptions app set up.
Have been working with the BOLD team to setup our subscriptions. Rebecca has been an awesome help! Thanks heaps BOLD.
Spoke to Priyanka today about setting up a discount code. She was very helpful and answered all of my questions. She showed me some new products I can use to improve engagement as well.
This App has lots of cool features and thanks to Simran in Support I had a great support experience once we managed to line up the timezones.
Great app, easy to navigate and amend things when needed. Really helpful chat service - Priyanka was very helpful when chatting online
It worked for a while, then many subscription orders started to go through without Bold, and it's been a mess. We cannot figure out why Bold works for some orders and doesn't for others.
Naman helped a lot with our subscriptions and figuring everything out. Bold has a lot of great features and has helped us a lot!

The set up is a little tough, but the customer support is very helpful and can get everything set up exactly the way you want it.                                                 

5 Stars for Carter, the customer support guy was awesome!

I am far from a tech person but every time I have a problem figuring something out customer service is right there. Tonight Naman was amazing. Took seconds to figure out what I needed, walked me right through the steps and solved my problem. Thank you so much Naman
I am only about a month into using the app which marks the start of new second payments hitting and Aryan has been SUPER helpful and patient with me to help me fully understand how things work!
Bold's customer support is great! Naman sorted out all my questions quickly, and was exceedingly patient.
Naman was so helpful! He walked me though everything and made the process so quick and easy! Thank you Naman!!

Carter was extremely helpful and very quick! 

The app itself is a little difficult to set up, although the tutorials are very helpful.

Full disclosure, Bold Customer Service used to be basically non-existent. As of late, their representatives have been beyond excellent- you can tell they've really stepped it up. I had Simran this time around and he didn't disappoint! Thanks for the help!
Carter was super helpful is clarifying some points with subscription app! amazing first two days using it.

Great app. A few teething issues, but the team are super helpful. I had fantastic help from Carter and Simran who helped me customise the widget on the store. A few extra features would be great, like easy customisation of the checkout page and allowing mixed cart discounts. But I'm sure these will come.

Excellent App if you can find some time to learn the functionality, team is very helpful, Rebecca & Carter helped us with all the questions we had. They even went beyond their responsibilities and helped us install some of the missing code. Thank you again.
Bold is easy to use so far and very responsive customer service. Less confusing than other apps. Carter is super helpful!

Have been using the app for years and I love it, it's very user friendly. 

Customer service is top notch, Carter made sure to find the solution to my issue quickly and in a friendly manner.
Very easy to use - Carter provided excellent customer service! Would love the ability to add a gift message that purchasers can update each month.
Really awesome app. Integrates with a lot of different payment gateways and has allowed us to do some really innovative stuff we've been wanting to do for a long time now. Great support aswell!

Aryan was a HUGE help, and all the support there has been extremely patient and helpful- very impressive!

The app could be quite good, although a couple of shortcomings... filtering products (e.g. by collection, tags etc) within build-a-box product selection is custom code offered >$1,000 US. 

Also, not clear how the different subscription types might allow to differentiate wording (e.g. a subscription-only product shows 'subscription available' on product page... however, I don't want to remove from products where 'one time purchase' is available as well), I'd like to remove 'quantity' field where I need to... and other very minor inconveniences. 

However- BEWARE- do NOT let customers use Paypal, google pay buttons etc. when purchasing subscription...they MUST use 'proceed to checkout' or they will pay, the order will not show up in queue because it's through a different sales channel (Bold doesn't use the other three payment types). 

Very, VERY awkward to call back my very best customers (subscribers), and try to have them go back and resubscribe, using a different payment type- when they've ALREADY paid, so also must send them a discount code to offset their prior payment). It's a bloody MESS... probably something I did, but if that was cautioned somewhere it wasn't evident to a noob like me. 

Anyways- people are great, give it a try, and be very aware of this other issue. Cheers-
Michael 
https://shop.nervousdog.com
Great customer service from Aryan Sharma! It has been a good experience during the design and development.
Very prompt and helpful customer service, thank you for getting us up and running!! We really appreciate it! Everything seems to be working great.
Carter provided excellent and prompt help via chat that fixed a big issue we were experiencing with our checkout.

Massive ups to the crew at Bold Apps - we tried another competing app, and realised that this had much much much more functionality and wanted to swap over - they (particularly Sarah) was super helpful in the migration across to Bold Subscriptions (and we've since expanded into other Bold Apps on other stores) - and then even checked up a week after we'd migrated to ensure all was operating smoothly...seriously A+ customer service - whatever you're creatively looking to achieve with your store, they have a solution for it  - and a ready to help you get it!
Carter is the best! He's very patient and super helpful when reviewing any questions I have about the app.
Naman was a great help. Very kind and quickly fixed the issues I was having. I am pleased with the service and app.
Carter was very helpful in troubleshooting product sync. The live chat function with their team is super comforting in case you ever have issues.
Best app out there to sell subscription products and great support, Priyanka helped & fixed my issue very quickly

I used this app to sell subscriptions and I do love the functionalities. The true star of the show however is the support, no doubt! Would recommend this app to anyone who wants to sell subscriptions on shopify :)
Priyanka was an amazing help! Thank you so much. They were very patient with me and all my concerns.
Pretty broken. They want to take a percentage of all sales. The support is god awful. And, the on-boarding process has been nothing short of a nightmare. Really, really bad. Stay away.
Carter & Vighnesh was very helpful in helping me get the product set up. I was able to use the chat customer support to solve the issue.

I started off using a competitor app and was unsuccessful for 3 days in setting up the subsctiption app to work (without naming it, it is highly rated on Shopify's app store). After getting zero response from support, I was then emailed an offer to pay for support for that app. Deleted the app and added this app instead. Within 1 hour of downloading the app, it was up and running. I even had an issue with the test order and Mayank in support live chatted me through the entire process. Support couldn't have been any better. Strongly recommended!
Very amazing app! Thank you to Carter from customer support for listening to all issues and helping me figure out what was wrong. Highly recommend this app and thank you again Carter.

The customer support here is outstanding, spoke with Mayank today. Amazing person to talk too. He addressed my all concerns by giving me immediate solution to it. In the past spoke to Harpreet & Laurel, both of them were very friendly with prompt solutions. In entirety everyone is awesome and helpful in this company. Thank you Bold Support!

Fantastic app and support, Naman was great at helping me when I stumbled into a problem, friendly and quick support! The app itself is easy to set up and manage and integrated well with our custom theme.
Carter, Samantha, and Melody were all great helping me with various questions today. Fast, smart, friendly and helpful live chat. Thank you.
The customer support here is outstanding, spoke with Daniel today and he was awesome. The apps are brilliant and the live chat is amazing top rated app for sure!!!! Start using them immediately 5*
Carter, on the bold help team is great. Thank you carter for all the help! Appreciate the speedy responses.
Kelsey in Customer Service was a pleasure to work with! She was friendly and efficient and helped us solve a concern easily! Thank you!
Priyanka is great!  The customer service has been great.  Very quick to respond and very helpful.   Thank you for your help!
Both Carter and Priyanka have helped me navigate the site and easily solved my problems when I had technical questions. Really great and efficient customer service.
Aryan S. was extremely helpful. Customer Service is perfect and the app is sweet. I recommend this one.
Naman was great, clear and quick! Solved my problem in under 10 mins! Great service! Thanks again Naman!
Melody and Rebecca did an amazing job with helping me get my store all squared away! I recommend them to any advanced or beginner shopify user! I am impressed, great work you guys! :)
Carter was super helpful when I was unsure of which type to use.  The whole Bold team has been great when I needed help!  Thank you
Naman was super helpful and friendly! My problem with the bold recurring orders app was solved quickly.

I used Bold to launch a subscription based product and was very pleased with the apps performance and ease of use. Most impressively the customer service team has gone above and beyond to answer questions every single time I have them, Carter has followed up and been a great resource of support!

I use BOLD app for my clients all the time since they have everything the clients want to use and I use them because of not only the features but also their customer support. Their support is just so helpful and FAST. Especially, a support agent, Naman, resolved our issue quickly and very helpful.
Thank you, Bold :) You guys are awesome!

I spent a lot of time researching which app was best for our specific purpose and this one was one of the best!  Customer support was always helpful and got back to me right away.  My hats off to you and your team : )

Have used bold for a couple of years now and really rate the support. They get things sorted quickly. (Thank you to Daniel for sorting some custom coding for me QUICK SNAP!) 

Haven't had any issues at all and the process to switch was easy, to maintain even easier and i am super happy with them.

We have completed setup and everything works well.  We are happy with the backend setup tools.  Samantha helped us out twice to get things rolling.  We are actually renting a physical product versus a typical subscription model, so we had to tweak a few things to make this customer friendly.  So far, so good!

This app does everything you need. Great customer service, Naman and Cody were quick to reply and help with an issue I was unable to solve on my own. I highly recommend Bold to anyone looking for a subscription plugin to their Shopify store.

Great app with good functionality. Sarah and Carter with Bold answered every question and problem I had perfectly and in good time. Sarah even notified me about and helped me fix problems that I didn't realize I had. Above and beyond EXCELLENT customer service! Thanks Sarah and Carter!
Customer service is terrific. They are available by email or inmediatly via chat. They always answer all my questions effectively. Thank you.
Some of the best support I've experienced in dealing with Shopify apps. Priyanka was outstanding in helping me with installation and theme-specific questions.
Loving the Bold subscription app and have found the speed and accuracy of the help from Vighnesh  a fantastic additional value.

Great app and great Customer service! Cody was knowledgable and helped me with everything I needed! I used this app for my meal prep company and it works like a charm! So far so good! My customers and I love how we can create our own subscriptions. Really separates ourselves from the competition
Aryan was great. Helped me without a delay. Look forward to installing yet ANOTHER bold up. Great products all around.

Aryan was fantastic, but all the help I've had with bold has been terrific.
Thanks for the great customer service both by phone and chat.

Aryan Sharma was very helpful!!!!!!!!!!

Thanks Again 
Answered all of my questions about notifications

Jack
Excellent customer support. Carter was very helpful in getting me set up with my subscription service. I will definitely be using Bold moving forward!
Great subscription app with even better customer service! Service is always fast and friendly, we definitely recommend giving them a try!
Really solid product and awesome support. Helpful in creating subscriptions on the Shopify platform. Naman was super helpful. Thanks Bold Commerce :)
Every time I mess up they always manage to fix it for me! Abhi has been brilliant in fixing my latest problem! Great customer service! Thank you Abhi!!
Brilliant customer review. So helpful and will go the extra ten miles, let alone one. The chat crew are great. Special shoutout to Daniel!

Great for a subscription business and excellent customer service (thank you, Ankur!) I do not recommend an automatic installation (which didn't work properly), but Ankur and his team were prompt and professional in fixing all the bugs.
We were having an issue within our customer interface. After a few minutes on a chat with Aryan Sharma, we had a work around until the website was corrected.  Thanks so much!
I was having issues, but once I started a live chat, an installation error was identified, and I got some super great help from Aryan to move to resolve it.
Customer service has been great and Bold has done a great job with the subscription app. It works well and does exactly what we need.

I subscribed to Bold because it was highly regarded, and I needed to immediately implement a subscription app. I was so pleased, when Snigdha informed me today that the install was complete, fast and quick, and on checking, it is performing perfectly. Very professional, and that is what online businesses should be about. Thanks Snigdha.
This app is very intuitive and easy to use. When I ran into a problem an awesome support staff member named Prianka was able to help me out in a matter of a few minutes.
Great support from Abhi. The app has a lot of useful tools and functionalities. The integration is really easy but if you have any issue you have free support to instal it. Thanks
Very good application, complete and easy to use. Extremely responsive customer support, thanks to Vighnesh for his help!
Cody was very helpful. Resolved my issue very quickly. Great communication and the app so far is great.

Does what it should. I will say that setup is a bit tedious. I'm not a developer, but i have some coding skill and was able to set it up relatively easy. However, for most people with no technical background, you'll likely need support. That said, their support team was great.

After I got everything installed, I was having issues adjusting font sizes, colors, etc. because my store settings were overriding the app settings. I got on live chat and spoke with Mayank who was very helpful in troubleshooting. I'd recommend this app and the people behind it.
Daniel is mah boi!!! But really. In the middle of the covid I've had a number of developers be slow and unhelpful. Not Bold! They are quick and knowledgeable! Very concise and friendly. Thanks!

I had a slew of questions regarding initial setup and Vighnesh did an awesome job working with me and showed great patience by answering each question one by one. In deciding between this and another subscription platform, this will be a major factor in the decision.

I'll start with what doesn't work.

1. Although Stripe is listed as a payment gateway option, it does not work for Stripe Mexico. After contacting Bold support, the answer was: We can't do anything, fix it with Stripe.

2. They have announced that it is possible to integrate the Zapiet app. But they don't mention that it doesn't work for the meal box model. They also have no other option to manage local deliveries. After contacting the support, the answer was: We cannot solve it, you should see it with Zapiet.

3. I needed a report with all the options selected by the clients in their meal boxes. Well, when contacting support they told me that something like this didn't exist. However, after searching a little more, I found the report by myself.

4. Recurring subscription charging does not work at all. For it to work it is necessary to deactivate the CVC / CVV request in my payment gateway. But my payment gateway requires that this JSON request be made from Bold in a specific way. After contacting the support, guess what the answer was: We can't do anything, you should see it with your provider.

In short, I can't receive payments and I can't plan deliveries either.

It works? Well, at first it looks functional, but it's not.
Raphael and the team were extremely helpful and went the extra mile to get Bold subscriptions up and running across a couple of my sites... can't recommend enough, great work guys! Thanks

Priyanka rocks! Good app, better than the others in terms of comprehensive customizations. Shipping dates, etc... need to be a little creative for multiple ship days, etc.. but it's all possible. Bold gets the job done.

i have been given excellent onboarding service. Abhishek answered all of my questions, and was very patient as I walked through each step. he made sure i understood what was going on at each step. The client service was prompt and very helpful!
Great and responsive customer service. Been using this app for a while now and have only had a few hiccups that were fixed quickly.
Thanking Daniel and his team for their quick and helpful response!  Bold Subscription responded back promptly.

Ankur & Priyanka thank you for all your help today resolving an issue I had with Bold Subscription. I appreciate all your help getting that refund to me and providing a telephone number to call in the future when needed.

Priyanka assisted me with finding language settings to clarify the buying experience for our customers. She was very helpful! Thank you Priyanka! Additional help from Clifford today provided a step by step solution to additional questions - saving me the need to contact BOLD. Great CHAT support from both agents.
Their live chat is super helpful. They respond quickly and have handled all our concerns. Carter in particular was very helpful and patient.
Good customer service. Always responsive and so far so good. The dashboard is also intuitive and not too difficult to use.
Carter quickly and efficiently walked me through some very basic steps that I was struggling with.
So far has worked well for my digital goods subscriptions. Aryan Sharma in customer service was great -- friendly and resolved my issue quickly.
I had a few questions and Vighnesh was able to solve them quickly. Very professional, accurate and knowledgeable.
Great customer service. Carter and Kelsey took care of our issue promptly. Great app, the additional recurring revenue created is well worth the monthly fee.

Excellent Customer Service!  Aryan was very professional & quick to respond.  
I would recommend this app. Thank You!
Very helpful bunch of folks who try their best to make you happy. Happy with app and happy with service. Highly recommend. Aloha!

Have not yet fully launched this app in our store but the customer service has been impeccable. Worked with Carter and Regina and they answer every last question with patience and detail. Excited to continue working with this company.
Excellent support from the tech team, really good app and interface. Spoke with the team todayand they were able to help and fix my problem in no time 10/10
The supportteam at Bold - Regina was perfect.... Really nice and super quick. They will fix my problem.
Carter helped me figure out where a customer can change their payment info and Regina helped get me back to Carter when my chat disappeared. Thanks!

its my time meeting the help team, aryan was instantly helpful, literally read my mind and solved my problem with ease, great communication, really appreciate the help. I wish all online assists were as useful.
Aryan Sharma was a huge help and sent me on the right path to the migration team. looking forward to using this app
Amazing live chat experience with Aryan Sharma. The help was amazing and all of my problems were solved. Thanks!

Just started using this app a few months ago. Customer service is quick. I spoke with Carter and he was helpful, friendly and he was able to point me in the right direction efficiently. I highly recommend this app. It's versatile and can be used in many ways for your business.

Loving the app so far. Will need to refresh and check back once the app gets up and running further. I had a few questions and Vighnesh was extremely helpful. I was a little surprised that Bold was quite a bit more expensive than other subscription apps but after researching, they seem to be quite worth the extra cost. And they came with 2 months free trial so that was an easy call.

I had an issue with understanding the process of connecting the “BOLD SUBSCRIPTION” app to my store. I thought I was going to pull my hair out. I called the help line and talked to Mayank. He voice was calm. He had so much patience with me with walking me through the necessary steps to setting up my store correctly. Thank you for helping me get through this trying time. Mayank “YOU ROCK” :-)
Really good app with great customer service. There was an issue with my site which was fixed by Brenda within 24 hours.
Laurel, customer service lady extraordinaire, was super duper helpful. Fast, efficient, amazing. Loving Bold. Bold rules.
I had trouble getting it setup, but it turned out to be a simple issue with my browser cache. Fast, spot on customer service by Aryan Sharma. Thank you!
I ran into a tiny glitch adding product on my site.  Vighnesh in customer support had it fixed in a flash.  Great customer service makes all the difference! Thank you.
I used this app for "Monthly Subscription" discount. It helps me to manage pricing. I have good experience with Customer support as well. Specially with "Naman".

This app has tons of features, it's easy to use, and it has quick, helpful support behind it. Priyanka was able to help me figure out my issue in a timely manner and with a great attitude. I love the app and recommend it to anyone else thinking of using subscriptions on their site!

The app is very straight forward, but our theme had some troubles adapting and installing. Good thing they have awesome support! Naman helped me get connected with the right department to fix the issue and also answered the many questions I had. Keep it up folks.

Update: The app has its shortcomings, but I still think it's the only decent build-a-box app for shopify. Their support team is still amazing. Chatting with me well after hours to make sure I don't leave the chat with some sort of answer to my questions. I really appreciated it. Shoutout to Priyanka for that.

Top-class customer service, fully recommended, they tailor-coded what my theme needed, thank you Bold. 
And special thanks to Rebecca G!
Naman was a great help setting up the app and my store for subscriptions, both being knowledgable and patient. Thank you!
Great customer service - Priyanka had the answer for me right off the bat - no wait. Very exceptional service. Top marks. Thanks again!
Alexa saved the day. Very helpful. Solved all of our issues. Give her a raise!!! App is working now!
A little expensive but may be worth the extra cost. The customer support is excellent. I deleted my subscriptions app by mistake and they had me back online in 10 minutes! Aryan was super helpful.

Regina has been an absolute blessing to work with. I was on the verge of canceling Bold Subscriptions due to hearing other services that are user friendly however Regina did her best in providing the best service I could ask for. For what I asked, I know it wasn't within her responsibilities to do however, I needed support and she made sure I received it to launch my subscription service. I will be a customer of Bold products as long as individuals like Regina are part of the team. Thank you for everything!!!!!

This app has a lot of functions. We were struggling with getting customers to opt in for subscription. Aryan was kind to extend our trial a little longer so we can try another strategy with subscription products. Thanks!
Ankur & Harpreet kaur are absolute wizards! They helped me work out a few kinks on my store. Customers are happy and that makes me happy. Thanks Ankur & Harpreet!!

Great App! I love the Support that comes with it! I have a feeling it's because they're Canadian (which I appreciate because I am too ;)). Thank Priyanka for your help today. You were patient, polite and awesome.

I haven't launched my new subscription service yet, so I can't speak to that end, but I GREATLY appreciate the support staff and installers for their assistance in helping me install this app. As far as the app itself goes, it seems really user friendly which I'm excited about. Looking forward to continuing to use another awesome BOLD app! Thanks Priyanka & Snigdha for your quick assistance!
Shout out to Daniel for helping me add a product to "Build your own Subscription'. Super helpful and speedy with fixing my issue. Thanks BOLD.
Aryan was awesome and helped me tremendously -- can't recommend enough. 10/10 customer service! A+ service!
Yes, i recommend this app. Thank you for your help, you were very helpful. Aryan Sharma! You were awesome! have a great day =)

Great app and amazing support team. Priyanka AND Dylan were both VERY understanding, patient, and attentive in helping me with the front end styling and customer experience. What more could you ask for?
Awesome customer service I receive today. They are patient and help walk me through setting up payments and connecting it to my shopify store.
Very good customer service. Is difficult to mention all of them but I remember I received great help from Simranjit, Samuel , Chintan
It's the staff that make this app so great! Everytime. Stunning customer service from Priyanka today . No problem too great, or small - entirely patient with our general tech-incompetence.

We are still in the trial period of testing and experimenting with the app on our web site. At the same time, we need to share our 5-star experience from the app, but also from the people behind it. Million thanks to Aryan Sharma, who has been so supportive that one can rarely enjoy such an open partnership. He addressed our request with patience, understanding and did all the things possible to accommodate our needs and support our business. Million thanks to you, Aryan and Bold team!

This app has been huge for our small business and allowing us to offer a subscription to our customers.  And whenever I need help, I just hop on the chat and I am taken care of.  Naman helped me just today and was so awesome!!

I'm not the most tech savvy person out there but I could figure it out. And when I have questions, I can jump in a live chat within the app (I'm on Shopify) and not have to leave. So they can walk me through what I need to do without me trying to remember the steps or wait for the transcript to send to my email. 
I've been with Bold for more than a year but what finally prompted this review is my most recent interaction with Carter. Coronavirus is here and starting to hit this small business - he was incredibly helpful, sensitive to our needs and went above and beyond what he needed to do. Huge thanks to the Bold team. and I know there are a couple of subscription apps out there but I definitely made the right choice.

This app is the lifeblood of our company.  Priyanka was just immensely helpful at a critical time for our company's growth.  Andriy, Victoria, Zach, and others have also gone to bat for us and helped us tremendously.  We wouldn't be where we are without this app and this team of people.  We're incredibly thankful for all of your great work and for your wonderful customer service.  Please keep it up!!  Take care and stay safe!

Great support by BOLD team. All subscription options are available with bOLD. Mayank & Naman provided me guidance for my complete integration. We are still working on some points but i m sure they will close it soon. Thanks Mayank, Naman & BOLD team

The app functions well as far as subscriptions but they have made it a nightmare to track Analytics correctly, Analytics tracking has the wrong reporting for total sales, the way they report creates incorrect data for Google ads making it a nightmare to run scusecfull ads. They also make it a nightmare to use tracking code for ShareASale and always just recommend that one starts using Refervission and do not care that we have a real affiliate program via ShareASale.  Their answer for everything that doesn't report well is basically sorry but we recommend you spend thousands and request customization.
Vighnesh and Harprett were first class at helping me get to a solution. Thank you! Not quite solved yet but I have faith!

The support for Bold is absolutely great. during a short chat Priyanka logged in on her side and sorted out our issues in no time. Highly recommend Bold. 
The online chat is amazing.  Update: again the support team was excellent one more time, with Samantha helping out in a very professional way and short time.
Great app for increasing LTV. Naman was also really helpful with a couple of issues we were having. Thanks again!

This app is quite helpful/easy to use and the support team is very friendly and supportive. Especially, Simran helped me a lot. His support is really kind, knowledgible and very customer oriented. Thank you!

Great customer service. Troubleshoot any issues easily.
Responsive and figured the problem out right away!

A fantastic app that has helped our business grow from strength to strength! Customer service has been swift and friendly. Many thanks to Carter for speedily resolving our queries via online chat, a big thumbs up from us!

We use multiple Bold Apps to help keep our store running in tip-top shape to compete with the major companies. Bold Apps allow us to compete on a high level while offering services like reoccurring orders that the customer craves. Today I reached out to support because of an issue with a customer order and Naman not only found the root of the problem but help me learn what was going wrong on our end. Bold Subscription is a must-have app for any store with reoccurring products like our plant-based cruelty-free skincare.
Carter was super helpful, quick and nice. He also educated me that a password protected site may create bugs! It was great to learn that since now it will save me time in the future.

This is a snow storm day today.   A customer contact me with a strange story about his subscription.  I tried to understand what's happening, a skipped some month and it looks like it is a prepaid or maybe a 3 fixed month.  Hard to know, I contacted the support, got Naman on the case.  Naman help me to understand what happened with it very quickly and I got back to my customer.  When credit card and pre-autorised payment are in, customer are always sensitive.  This is serious.  I'm using Bold subscription since many years and I got this kind of support many, many times.  It is important for me to get this kind of service.  And today, I'm looking at the windows, and through the snow storm, alone at my desk, I know I'm not alone.  :-)
The app is very capable and works well for our purposes. But, the best thing about BOLD is the tech support.  It's always a pleasure (and educational). Simran and Chintan rock!
Carter was very helpful! Appreciate the speed and efficiency. We really like bold and continue to use it on our sites.
Got some fast and thoughtful help from Mayank and Vignesh.  Guys are great.
Great app, great customer suppor, loaaaaats of possibilities and they're not to expensive. Great package
Clifford, Alysha, Paul and Naman helped me get this app installed and running in my dev store quickly. I am happy with this app's features and support from Bold subscription team!
Sukh, Clifford & Taylor were a great help to me getting this app installed. Thanks for the great customer service!
Great customer service I started my trial and never got a chance to use it and Kelsey extended my trial as soon as I reached out!
Aryan Sharma is very patient & helpful! Top Lad. He has been working with me for the past 40 minutes
Great and very considerate customer service! Shoutout to Scott! Great service and very useful app!!!
carter rocks! He helped me through a ton of details and was not in the least bit annoyed. He was there till the end!
The app has worked really well and customer service HAS ALWAYS been available to help. Had a cashe issue with recurring orders and Sukh helped to eliminate the problem. Thanks

We have not officially launched the subscription application yet but it has great functionality that we have witnessed in our testing.  The support has been great in getting us set up. We love this app.  It has been a consistently reliable way to provide subscription options for our coffee roasting business.  Jonnathan was also a huge help when we discovered a coding issue that hindered check out.  He found the issue and fixed it in a matter of 24-48 hours.  Excellent service.

We lost about $2000 worth in goods through this app. Their functionality has been a good help to our business and their support is great. Both of those did not take away that the integration of their payment gateways is compromised.

Through an exploit in the app, an automated attack allowed to place orders with fraudulent credit card data. Whilst the payment gateway (Authorize.net) itself flagged these payments, Bold (or the third party they use for this) did not pick up on these flags and marked all payments as successful. We only found these activities by chance.

To me this was a huge trust-breaker, given this software is using payments for the majority of it's functionality. Even worse, they were the last party to respond (after Shopify and Authorize.net) when it became clear we ran into problems.

Even though the solution works, it cost us more than it delivered in the end. Which is a very sad story.
Carter did an amazing job! Great patience and careful instructions to get the job done right! Alexa did a great job in helping second hand also. Shoutouts to Carter once again!
Just started using Bold Subscriptions, but had a question about how to use the buy button.  Samantha was a super help through chat!  Quick & attentive & super knowledgeable, which in my book is gold!

I just switched to Bold subscriptions for another app. For me there have been two key differences. One is the easy option to enable a required Terms and Conditions checkbox on checkout. Yes, you can code this in but it can be tricky to figure it out when you are redirecting to a subscription cart. Having a toggle option in the settings is so much easier. 
The second difference is chat support. We had a small issue with the install where our theme code didn't line up with their tutorial. We were able to msg with Laurel through their chat feature then she connected us on to Taylor who took a look at our code and helped us right away. This is way better than a back and forth email chain with lots of different people answering the 'support' email box.
The app has lots of features we won't be using right away, for custom boxes etc. but its good to know we have options to expand/grow,
This app is great! It has been easy to set up and any time I had questions I used the live chat feature. Mayank helped me and was extremely responsive and helpful!

Thank you so much to Regina for taking the time to do that I really appreciate it! She had to go check with people multiple times on my crazy ideas and stuck with me the whole way.

Stay away from this app. They state they support different gateways, but really they don't. They use a feature within the gateway to save creditcard information, but the problem is, often the gateway still wants the CVC code, so the recurring subsciption fails, and it will cost you a lot of money. Then you think, well i can just switch to stripe, which is well supported by bold, but no Bold Clearly don't want to deal with the problems, they promised 3 days to port the customers.... This has now been going on for 3 months, and bold doesn't do anything to get the problem solved. If you don't write them litteraly all the time, they will just forget about it, and hope someone magically solves the problems for you, because they aren't interested in helping... There exists a ROTTEN culture within BOLD, and the internal comunications. And suddely someone else writes you, and you can waste time trying to explain to this guy all over again, what you have tried to explain the first guy in weeks... I cant seem to get them to help me...

**Update: One of their app specialist, Cody, contacted me.  He had their team look over and reconfigure my set up.  Turns out that another app was interfering with the functions of the subscription. Fortunately, the customer mentioned in my initial review came back and set up her subscription successfully today.  I do recommend this app and am happy to continue using their services at www.greatmorningscoffeeandtea.com**

I really hope I can update this review with a better rating, but right now I am not happy.  I have a customer who has attempted to do a reoccurring order twice.  The first time the order showed up in my orders as reoccurring, but I later saw that it wasn't in my subscription app.  I assumed she canceled the order.  When her husband contacted me about their order, I told her I didn't have an upcoming order for them and that his wife must have canceled (she confirmed she never did).

After convincing her to try again today, I saw that not only did the order NOT show up in my subscriptions again.  It also gave the discount when the customer added it to their cart but took the discount away at check out (while still showing the tags of what the discount should been).  
Fortunately, this is a very loyal customer and I am working out the details of her order.  But now it worries me to think that I may be missing out on sales because my subscription services seem dishonest and that is reflected on me and my business.  I have submitted an email and tried everything to troubleshoot on my own. But if this can't be worked out quickly, I may need to look into other options.  

I don't know when this became an issue, because my older subscriptions still process without an issue.  But I haven't had a new subscription in months.

Alexa did a GREAT job making the exact adjustment needed on our website! 

We were only expecting to receive directions on how to make this change ourselves after Bold opened for business on Monday. But no! Alexa went into our site and made this change for us...on a SATURDAY!!!!

Disappointed! Their service was good and the app is decent and all seems to work. However, you will most likely need them to install it as it happened to me, the automatic seems not to work properly.

What really disappointed me about this app though was this:

THEY DO NOT FOLLOW the settings of your payment processor. I have it to "authorize" an order and not "capture" because I want to make sure and double check my product is in stock before the payment is actually processed.

This is important because you will also avoid refund fees from your processor if you simply authorize and then when you are sure, you capture. 

However, "bold" captures the payment and does not follow my merchant processor settings within shopify. As such, I have to void the order from my processor and then I am left with a paid order within shopify.

It just messes everything up. Then, I have to manually cancel the customer subscription too.

Very disappointed.

I am loving the customer service for the bold application. I have been working with Taylor and he is fantastic. I wish all my support tickets we so pleasant nd helpful.

FALSE/MISLEADING ADVERTISING!!! 
They advertise subscription boxes all over their front page and even in the title of the app, and yet you have to pay for the advanced level to access the major feature advertised. I would understand if they charged a slightly higher amount but an extra $170 USD (6 times more than base)  for the feature marketed in the title is predatory and most would consider this to be misleading advertising.  

On top of all this, they add their own transaction fee. This would be fine if they didn't charge you the ludicrous $200 a month. 

I will fully admit their application has good functionality but the prices charged are not sustainable for a small business.

1 Star because the app basically works, and another star because they have a live chat where someone answers ... BUT, it has tons of useless restrictions. Lots of little things that are easily added, but they keep funneling you to their developer requests page so they can quote you and make you pay for a feature that honestly should 100% be included, specially for the price tag.

They bill $200 a month plus 1% on transactions, which from this store is at least an additional $140+ a month in fees. Yet, you can't do simple things like the below.

- no more than 1 custom shipping option. Why even limit it to one custom option ?!
- you can't exclude shopify shipping options. That's a tick of button feature that's needed.
- for standard subscriptions, you can't track what day of the week they pay in order details within shopify. If you want notes or special tags for separate subscriptions, you're screwed.
- for build-a-box, you can't simply switch boxes within the same subscription. Your clients have to work it hard to cancel one subscription, place another order and then that works. NO Customer, wants to work this hard.
- we had to build out separate standard subscriptions just so we can control what day of the week orders process when within the same week.
- AND most important of all, ifs you run adwords, you CAN NOT track sales without requesting something custom from a partner or developer of theirs. MORE Money for something so basic.

Because they control all the pages used during checkout, you're cut at the knees to make it reflect well for your business. There are a lot more issues that are so basic, but they seem to be more inclined to be greedy for these features to be added, than be happy with the hundreds of dollars they bill you every month just for using an app that has been the same for a couple years. Try other apps before you are stuck with Bold. They should realize that a happy customer who's store can scale and have access to other simple settings will stay longer and pay those hundreds of dollars a month for longer. Instead, they want you to pay more or leave. Greedy.

Challi was very helpful together when we switched to a new store on Shopify.  We've been using Bold Recurring and Bold Cashier for a few months now - super easy with minor set up issues that were quickly resolved.

I installed this app one week ago. After installation I wanted to trial the app so I didn't make it live yet. However, my customers could not complete any purchases after I installed this app. Every time a customer went to click "checkout" it would go to a blank page that said "Bad request". So I uninstalled the application, which caused even more issues. Bold has embedded their code everywhere in the back end of my shopify theme code, which has caused my site to malfunction and caused my business a large amount of loss of sales. I immediately contacted Shopify, my theme code developer and Bold to assist. Bold did not assist to fix the code problem, I have not received a single call back from Bold, I have not received any updates from Bold. I have tried to email them to get an update and ask them to fix it but I'm stuck with a website that has their code written on the front end of the customer view site. I am not a coder, I have no coding experience which is why I pay for shopify, pay for the theme and pay for a Bold subscription to use their support. I installed Bold because of the reviews it has. However, my theme developer has told me Bold is notorious for doing this, I wish I had never installed Bold. It disturbs me that I only installed Bold for a trial and it has caused me and is still currently causing me loss of sales due to customers not being able to complete their purchases and due to Bold's code appearing on my websites shop front causing customers to click away as the site looks terrible as things are not running as they are meant. I am really disappointed and frustrated. I don't know what more to do. This is my livelihood and for an application that I haven't even made live to have that ability over my site is disturbing, especially that Bold has not taken the right measures in a timely manner to even fix their mistakes on my site. I'm really not happy with their products and I do not recommend them. I have requested compensation from Bold for my loss of sales which I have not received any response to.
Great support team. Helped me with a lot of stuff and they take their time to answer. The only shopify app who does automatic recurring. Special thanks to RONY for the help,

Very easy to fix issues via support, very easy to use system, reccomended! 

Shoutout Alexa (bold commerce) for the help!

Requested their customer support team to manually edit my checkout page and they delivered very quickly. On top of their team, their app is top-notch! If you're still looking for subscription apps, look no more! This is the one for you.

TLDR: Their email system is not set up correctly. Contacted their devs about it numerous times, but they were incompetent and did not fix it. If you're concerned about subscription emails being delivered, I'd steer away from them. 

Specifically their SPF records were not set up correctly, and ASPF and ADKIM are unable to pass verification. As a result, subscription transaction emails often get flagged as spam or at a minimum have the "via boldapps.net" tag. We directed them to the appropriate docs to fix said issue, but they refused. If they cannot set up their email servers correctly, it leads me to question how they can run a subscription app. We are looking into switching to Recharge.

Sukh was able to not only answer my question, but guide me through making the necessary modifications on my end. I am totally impressed and relieved that my problem was solved so easily. Thank you, Sukh!

Our Shopify store (safeguardian.com) needed a solution that included a one-time product purchase plus a required recurring service subscription with affiliate commission tracking. Not an easy criteria and we were told by many other apps that they could not do it. The Bold subscription app was the perfect solution. More importantly, their support in getting the app set-up properly and integrated fully with the other required apps was absolutely incredible. Right in the middle of the Christmas shopping season, they (shout out to Lucas) worked closely with us daily until every last tweek was in place and tested. The Bold Subscription app is a excellent choice to consider if you are selling non-product or product + recurring service.  Highly recommended!!!

I am becoming Bolds biggest fan. I cannot say enough how great their support is. Every time we add a new Bold app they prove to me again that their support is unmatched. We currently have 5 different Bold apps installed and they are all great! Don't mess with other sub-par solutions just get Bold.

3.5 out of 5. 

Solid product, good customer service. 

However, we've had several issues with recurring orders not going through - even though it's setup correctly in the backend. Bold has had to manually make sure the orders recur, which is not good because it doesn't give us confidence that as we scale, this will be a reliable service. 

Additionally, they only allow credit cards for recurring payments: No paypal, No apple pay or any of the dozens of other payment methods that users come to expect. Issuing refunds and issuing discounts and managing everything has to be done via their app, and not shopify. So if you have products that are not recurring, it create duplicative work and gets confusing. 

At the end of the day this is a great option if you're just starting out and need to get a recurring revenue stream going. But, I'd hesitate to trust it if we're doing tens of thousands in MRR or ARR. That being said, if you get to that point it should be fairly trivial to build a robust system yourself anyway.

This app has one job: Facilitate subscriptions. We launched our subscription service yesterday morning. Many customers were charged multiple times, some up to five. Many are justifiably furious at us. First Bold tried to blame the merchant account, then Shopify, and now they just won't call us back or email us. They have offered no solutions. Basically a shrug of the shoulders is what we've received. Complete joke.

Great solution.  We started with Bold but then switched to Recharge thinking the solution had addressed a few issues with Bold but that was a mistake.  We had nothing but problems from the second we tried Recharge.
1) Recharge requires you create new items for each subscription so you have duplicate items.  Additionally, it only supports one subscription model, ie weekly, monthly or yearly.  Bold support all of the above.  Recharge is also not as integrated as it leads you to believe.  Much of the process and workflow is accomplished through the use of add-on landing pages, etc that have very limited theme features.
2) Lastly, the support was terrible.  They ask you to fill out a form for migration support.  We did so and no one got back to us and when they finally did, they just sent a set of instructions to follow.  Why waste someone's time having them complete a form if you are not going to help them migrate to the solution.

Needless to say, we came back to Bold and love it.  Very simple and easy to use and install with a lot of advanced features.  The one thing that Recharge does shine on is their customer login interface.  Definitely much nicer.

We have used Bold from the start and are very pleased with how they handle our requirements as a subscription-only shop. Thanks Jevon <3

The product images were gone and replaced with hyperlinks. Product prices and totals were also gone. I deleted the app and spent the next hour fixing everything this app messed up. The app itself doesn't do what I want it to do and although it offers a 90 day trial, there is no way I'd pay the ridiculous price this app has after that trial. Its frustrating to use and set up. Is BOLD technical? Yes! Not going to lie to you however, you get what you pay for and BOLD isn’t going to stop at what they’ll be able to offer in the future. We have had nothing but stellar customer service with Bold, and are very happy! Shout out to Javon, Arcee, Genevieve, Cam, and whomever else always helps us out. Thank you!

**Update: I have reduced my star rating from 5 to 4 based on: (1) customers not being able to pause subscriptions (just push the date out) and (2) not being able to see or follow up abandoned carts (I think this is possible with Cashier but not with just this App) and (3) there was at least a day when the cart simply wasn't working at all due to an unexpected Shopify update on the backend. Guidance for customers on how to log in and adjust subscriptions doesn't exist which is also a significant weakness - I see on Hotjar a lot of people struggling with this. The support staff are still exceptional and the App has allowed me to build a subscription business and so despite these weaknesses it still deserves 4 stars. **

Bold have repeatedly asked me to review the app, as do most developers, but I wanted to wait until I had a decent amount of experience with it, which I now do.

The app has great functionality and the team is fast to help. It's remarkable what you get for only $20 a month. I won't go into all the features - I think Bold's sales pitch does that pretty thoroughly!

The best thing you can get from reviews is knowing where the skeletons are. So that's what I'm going to do, but keep in mind this app is categorically a 5 star offering.

In the back end it feels like you have two stores, with parts of it syncing really well, and other parts being manual and sometimes clunky.

For example, I have found the process for deleting items from your store and then from the Bold's app difficult. There is a clear guide from Bold on how to do this, and it should be simple, but clicking the links in the app to fix issues with having deleted items on subscriptions often just ends up with the fix 'hanging' - much the same as the cursor on your Mac turns into a spinning colourful ball. I have found that if you leave it for hours it eventually works. I've brought this up with the team but haven't had success in getting them to understand the problem (they think that I'm not able to follow the steps, but I can, it's an issue of speed.)

Coupon codes don't sync between the app and the Shopify store. This isn't a huge deal for me as I'm not using hundreds of them. It's something to consider though if you are using a lot of coupon codes as depending on your business you may often be entering them all twice. 

You also can't give a 0% or $0 discount with a coupon code like you can in Shopify. This may seem weird but there is a use case for it - you can sync Bold with Refersion (which is great), but if you want a referral code to only reward the referrer but not the buyer then you want the buyer to enter the code, have it trigger in Refersion but not discount the purchase price. The use case here is that if the Referral partner is a charity and the buyers are motivated to enter the code to help the charity and not to get a discount. This is a rare example, but still getting out in the open.

But again, this is a $20 app, and see all the cool stuff it does in Bold's description. It still easily gets 5 stars - the value for money is remarkable. I just want to add value in this review by telling you what they obviously won't. 

I can't fault the functionality and flexibility in what you can do with subscriptions, in terms of having one off orders and subscriptions, having a mix etc etc, clearly described in Bold's sales pitch. It's all true and amazing. 

The portal for the customer is functional, but without spending money on development (which at this point I can't afford) it does not bring any 'delight' to the customer. It does what it needs to do, but the user experience could do with some improvements. The first thing I would do is create a video that appears when the customer logs in for the first time which would show them what all the buttons do and how to use them. For example, of course the store owner knows that the customer can reduce the next order without reducing the following orders, but the customer doesn't know this. A tech savy person may work it out, others may just delete their subscription. So communicating the amazing flexibility of the software with the end user is a huge potential area of improvement. Polishing that portal up for out of the box users would also be great. It lacks beauty. Again, it's $20 a month. Perhaps they could have a second tier that costs more but has these additional features.

Be aware that there are loads of potential emails that can go to customers when different actions are triggered (such as a change in delivery date, qty, price, etc etc) and at some point early on you are going to want to invest a significant amount of time in customising those emails. The ability to customise them is a feature, but factor it into your planning.

The single biggest warning I will give to people considering this app is this: be clear about what you want to offer customers before you install it. Don't make my mistake. The app offers so much flexibility and functionality that it's easy to fall into the trap of thinking "whoa, I didn't even think about the ability to do that!". Before you know it you may start thinking about changing your business model because of what you can do with the app. This is dangerous territory - and a trap I've well and truly fallen into. A monthly subscription box is nice and simple. You can do WAY more than this with Bold's app. The question I have to keep asking myself is should I? Or am I falling in love with the technology and not the customers?

So far things have been great. I'm using Recurring Orders and Customer Pricing app together. Having both functions coming from the same parent company has been awesome to have them work and integrate together. It took a bit to transfer all my information over from my previous app, but the support team was really helpful throughout the entire process. Cody, Harpreet, and Brenda have been great. Now that it's up and running, provides huge value to my company. Highly recommended!

I love knowing there's money coming in with Bold's super intelligent dash board. If you're worried about tech issues, don't. Bold's people are awesome, responsive and problems solvers. After a long and hard decision I decided to sign up with Bold but after waiting for two business days for the liquid installation I got impatient and decided to go with another Recurring Orders app service. We were using ReCharge for over a year but as we grew, the app couldn't grow with us and felt like there was a lack of support and features. So decided to give Bold a try and I have been blown away by the features, and more importantly the prompt support!! Leanne has been extremely wonderful in helping with the migration and all other question's i've thrown her way! There's definitely some learning curve but it'll be worth it!

So far so good, a few issues, but with the support of Jevon and his team all problems were fixed, very quickly. Nice to install an app and actually be provided with quick and knowledgeable support. Thanks Bold

So far this app has been a great solution for us as we wanted to include the option to subscribe to our product families. Customer care has been great as well, they respond to inquiries quickly and with great detail. The bold customer care team has been great to us which helps us ensure we are providing the best customer care to our consumers!

We needed to update our recurring subscriptions.  It was WAY more work than we anticipated.  Leanne held our hands the whole time until it was all handled, even over the Christmas holiday.  Other customer support staff, like Paul, are very knowledgeable, helpful and patient when other issues arise.  Definitely recommend to others...
Paul is great! Helped me with everything I needed. I've been using this app now for a while and it has been great :)

I know very little about coding, but you don't need to be a coding genius to use this app - Bold is very easy to install and if you run into ANY issues, their customer service team will fix it in record speed. 

You should know:
1. If you email them, you'll hear from them almost immediately.  I know that if I email them with a question at 10am, I'll have an answer to that question by 2 or 3pm. This isn't normal, but it's absolutely incredible. 

2. You do not need to be a genius to set this up.

3. This app has tons of features and will fit any kind of subscription you want to offer. I couldn't recommend this enough.

4. The membership portal for your customers is very nice and easy to use. Your customers will thank you.

5. They have several different payment gateways to use (stripe, braintree) which is great!  I was told that paypal checkout would be supported (through braintree) within the next 1-2 months. 

6. I am thrilled with the decision to buy this app and I'm certain you will, too. It's cliché, but this app is actually worth every penny.

If you get this app, you'll probably get to work with some of Bold's finest support staff - like Leanne. She is incredible. I asked Leanne a billion and one questions  to the point where I'm sure I was just being super stupid half the time and she always responded within a couple hours to help me figure this or that out.

Brad, Brenden, Victoria, and James - each one of you took the time to respond to me in such a kind way - thanks!!

We use over half of all BOLD apps for our store and this app has been a huge benefit to our brick & mortar/online store. Our members LOVE the fact they can "set it and forget it" as well as the versatility it offers them. In the 6 months since we installed this app, we have so far secured over $16,000/yr just in recurring sales. It has created a whole new level of customer loyalty! The only wish I would have for improvement is if the app could automatically adjust recurring order pricing based on price adjustments made in our Shopify. It's been the only tedious and time-consuming part.

We use the Bold Reoccuring Orders App. We are a new online store (3months) and have already booked over $500 dollars a year in reoccurring orders. That $500 would not have happened if not for the Bold App. Each month we get more subscribers ! 
Additionally we ran into a glitch after Holiday Sales Peomotions wee over and Leanne with Bold  and Morhan from the Tier 2 Team - were right on it !
We are a small company NOW LOL but with Bold behind us we have a TEAM

This App has worked very well for my store.  It is easy for me as a store owner as well as my customers to manage their subscriptions.  Customer service has also been very good.

Chad
Using this app combined with Bold's Product Options app has been perfect for our Wine Club subscription model. Bold's support team has been awesome and very helpful as well!

I absolutely love how the app simply takes care of it all! I am new to this business, but set up was easy, smooth sailing for my customers so far -- I'm grateful for an app that made my business idea become a reality -- a subscription based health resource!

They answered all my questions so patiently as I was choosing which app would work best for my business! Cody and Brenden were super helpful as I've had questions along the way.
The customer service is one of the best I've ever seen. Members of the Bold team go above and beyond to help with any questions or challenges. I would definitely recommend this product.

The recurring orders app has worked wonders for us in retaining our quarterly magazine subscribers, and the team at Bold has been extraordinarily helpful, especially Leanne, who's worked with us tirelessly to make the app's flexibility and multiple features work to our advantage. I can't recommend them -- and their excellent, effective, and patient customer service -- enough! Thank you Leanne and team for making our business so much better, and more profitable!

Highly recommended.

I'm super impressed with the customer service and responsiveness of the team at BOLD.   I had initially planned on using one of the other recurring subscription apps that was also rated 5 stars, but within the first 48 hours of downloading and initiating no word from them........still no word, LOL.

The user interface has been great and I have been able to easily update things on both my laptop and my mobile device (challenges with other apps).  

End of the day I am glad that the other guy dropped the ball and that we went with Bold.  I'm excited to try other apps that they provide as well.  

Specifically I have interacted with Victoria, LeAnne, Brenden and Josh.  Great people to work with and thanks for the support!

I can’t recommend this app and Bold customer service enough. I know nothing about coding and I found the app to be pretty easy to use. When I needed help, Victoria was AWESOME. She listened, gave good recommendations and even set some aspects up for me. I felt like she and the other Bold professionals were in my corner and wanted me to succeed. My first online order was for a recurring subscription so I’m thrilled that I used this app.
Jordan did a great job setting up our account after a site theme change...super thankful for the help and to have our site fulling back up and running :)
Really enjoy so far and great customer service. Easy install and great support by Jevon!

I have tried another app and Bold is really fantastic. The app itself works great and their customer service is amazing. With technical questions, you do not want to be left by yourself trying to figure them out and they answer your email in a very timely manner and can even call you. Nothing better! Signup with closed eyes. I am very demanding and I am happy.

Sweetwaters Coffee & Tea recently launched a new Coffee Subscription service with help from Bold and they have played an integral role in getting our service live. We had tons of questions related to specific functions we wanted, tech issues and the best way to get our service off the ground and they were a TREMENDOUS help! Everyone on their support team was readily available, knowledgeable and overall lifesavers. I cannot thank them enough for helping us with all the little questions and confirmations that go into launching a subscription service. 

James, Robb, Jevon, Logan Brenden, Josh and their Tier II support team have all been there for me since Day 1. These are people behind an application worth paying for. 10/10!

Having the add to cart button for my subscription products has made marketing campaigns so much easier.  I was not able to have marketing landing pages before but now I can.  It has made a big difference

It sounds ridiculous... but just the fact that someone always gets back to you within 24 hours is awesome.  For so many apps (like the vast majority) it is a toss up on whether you will get help at all and for the rest of them, the support takes a crazy amount of time bc they are overseas.  They answer a question at like 2AM...I get the answer and respond back at like 8AM... and then have to wait until 2AM the next day...and it goes on and on.  

But not with these guys... get right back to you and then follow up with you to make sure they answered the question to your satisfaction.

Epic support from Leanne!

She went above and beyond what I would expect for support. She even brought in the Tier II guys to do a little customization for us. They also did a great job!

In short, she solved a big problem for us because I had not set up our subscription box account correctly.
If you guys have Super Hero awards, please give her one to show my appreciation.
Bob Hagan
Club SciKidz Labs-Where Science and Technology Connect!

This app is mediocre at best. Unfortunately, if you're looking to run a recurring subscription service you really only have two options. The unintuitive user interface, obnoxious automated emails, and lack of flexibility clearly demonstrates that there is a massive opportunity for someone else to come into this space and do this 10x better (with minimal effort).

As a new e-commerce store owner, it can be a confusing and difficult process navigating the many twists and turns of apps, coding, and customer processing. But Bold has made it seamless with Recurring Orders.

I was previously using a different app for autoships and was very dissatisfied with their customer service and backend, and Bold blew them out of the water. 

You do not need to think twice about using this app. Their customer service is beyond incredible (I wish I could hire them for my own company - specifically Leanne is a gem of a woman and my personal fairy godmother in all things autoship haha), the consumer facing app aesthetically pleasing, and the backend system robust.

I would recommend them to anyone wanting autoship, already have, and will continue to sing their praise.
AWESOME APP. Super support. I used POWr for Wix and it was almost impossible. Thank you for a great product!
Fantastic app for subscriptions.

We recently switched from Recharge and we are so glad we did. Hands down such a better app and when you use all the other great Bold apps like Upsell, Brain and Product Discount your store is ready to rock and your worries disappear. 

Hands down the best and fastest support staff we have ever experienced. We are so happy! 

Thank you BOLD!

Update 2019 - still love this fabulous app with super service and great features improving all the time!

I so love this app and the wonderful service provided by the Bold team. Well worth it.  Thanks Bold!
Love this app so much as it has made a very tedious job as easy as pie! Great customization options and even better support! Consistently come out with even better features as well! Good on ya Bold!
Some of the most helpful support staff that I have encountered. Always informative and curious. Can't thank the staff at Bold, especially on the Recurring Orders App team, enough.
