Hands down the best subscription app on Shopify! Easy to use, very flexible and nimble to adjust to whatever your store needs are. Their support and developer team is incredible too, they pulled through last minute to complete an integration that I know a lot of their valued users appreciate. Permanent loyal fan of this app and the rest of the Bold suite of apps. Rockstar app, and rockstar team, keep up the great work!

I don't usually write reviews, but this company warrants one. The feature set and functionality this app provides is as good as any other out there if not better (and we have tried a few). But what sets them apart is their service and professionalism. You are buying into a first class, full service organization by using this app and as any store owner knows, service is the most important thing we sell!

* Update April 13 2020 - As always, the Bold team has gone above and beyond for us many times. Carter helped us out today and fixed a problem I didn't think could be fixed. Carter made it easy. Very pleased. 

Previous review: Excellent, unprecedented customer support. I've had issues because of the complexity of what I was trying to do, (not because of the app... which actually makes things simpler...) and even when I thought I was being annoying, the Bold team members have been fast, helpful, and super friendly. Pretty amazing actually.

We've been working with Reoccurring Orders since July. The BOLD team is super responsive and helpful when we have questions regarding billing, processing, and even small items such as "does your app have 'x' capability" Robb specifically worked with us when our customers were not charged due to an error on our end of things, and helped get them recharged so we could continue with shipping our subscriptions as planned! Would recommend the app to all stores looking for an easy way to track subscriptions and view how well it is preforming!

Our orders have become more consistent and predictable since we installed the Recurring Orders App.  The option to offer discounts for subscriptions seems to be appealing to our customers, and there are built in features to help ensure that people don't 'game the system' by ordering once at a lower rate, then cancelling the subscription.  Well done.

The customer service is also outstanding.  We had a conflict with another Shopify app, and Bold responded to us with a fix within ten to twenty minutes.

Yes i like the app.  There seems to be a couple glitches using my Responsive theme.   On the subscribe drop downs the number and week or month over lap each other.  Also when starting a new subscription item or category it’s a little confusing when trying to use max number of recurring orders.  It makes me choose that in order to do a gift option. otherwise s good feature.
Easy to set up subscriptions - great way to get rebuys.

This service is allowing me to offer my Monthly Pen Subscription Service with ease and little to no effort when it comes to maintaining the backend. Great customer service and technical service. 
It’s Just a Personal Touch Not Machine Made, WhataPen.com

Hands down, we have never received better, more responsive customer service help than from the team at Bold Recurring Orders. We're using the Bold Recurring Orders app in a unique way, and the team has been at the ready to make customizations, help edit our subscription groups, tweak this that and the other thing, and in general guide us as we're continually building our website. Big shout out to Leanne, who has held my hand from the beginning, and Victoria, Brendan, and Robb too for their never-ending 'get-it-solved' magic! This app is more robust than any other on the market, and the Bold team will do whatever they can to help! 

Review 2.0 - Thanks to Michelle & the Bold developers for immediately investigating a shipping issue and finding a resolution. Bold is always ready to help!

I've been nothing but impressed since switching over. Everything runs without a hitch and is easily understood, but still has all the features you could want. The support team has been nothing short of legendary. I've asked Robb question after question and I'm always met with patience, eagerness to help, and solutions. Bold is awesome and I commend it to everyone.
Brendan and his people were so fast (and accurate) with their responses that I was quite shocked. Amazing service!
Amazing customer support from Raj dispite my barrage of questions. cant wait to use it officially once biz kicks off!

I must commend James Gudge, Tier 1 Client Success, Recurring Orders Team!

He fixed two items on my site that I noted and one I hadn't noticed. He was responsive, asked great questions to get to the root of my problem, and was a joy to work with. 

James, Thank You!

Disappointed to find that this app doesn't follow the sales tax rules as defined within Shopify and can't be configured to correctly calculate taxes where more than one tax rate is required (which is common in the US).

Great looking app, very responsive technical support staff. But - it doesn't work correctly.

**Update** - Sometimes all you need to do is ask...in this case I didn't even need to do that. The support team was proactive about asking me if I needed help, and all I needed to do is give them temporary access to my Shopify store and the completed the setup.  So far, this app and the support I have received have been exemplary! 

It seems like it will do what I need, however the setup process involved a signficant number of steps and time constraints have prevented me from completing the setup.

Ron Myers

Great app, very easy to use and manage. Amazing support by Bold team for the customization of the app in our store. A special thank to Fred and Raj at Bold for their patience and full understanding of our customization requirements.

This app is the worst thing that ever happened to us and our customers!! It is so buggy and honestly, should not be allowed in the Shopify developer ecosystem. Specific issues: the recurring billing is buggy. It fails to bill customers when it should. It doesn't show images for certain items loaded. It is tedious to manage - requires items are entered individually - try doing that for hundreds of items with variants which are treated as separate items. The box item selections are confusing. We never know what to expect. We should have known to stay away when the installation was problematic in the first place. If you value your customers and business, please stay away from this app. We are going back to the app we used previously (recharge). Let's not talk about the financial cost Bold has had on our business in terms of customer recovery.

Just built our Shopify site!  And installed Recurring Orders & Subscription Box App; my first point of support was Raj, who walked me through the pros and cons of switching from a membership model to a subscription - he sent me support docs and we decided on Recurring Orders & Subscription Box.

We are a patient education publisher and for 15 years licensed directly to hospitals... now we want to license to the 800k physicians in USA and Canada.

The issue with the Recurring Orders we had was that the BOX. for us needed to be pre-built w/pre-filled units - the "selection" area is an awesome client feedback of what's licensed in the box. We contacted BOLD and got the "we can do" answer and met Morgan! Well between our building the site, some site template issues and yes, CEO incompetence - Morgan built and re-built a script that achieved our special needs. Shoutout- thanks to Morgan for his effort and spirit.

We are less than 7 days out yet feel confident in running our first Facebook campaign knowing that the site is sound and that BOLD is available behind the scenes with a smart and nice support team. Thank you again, Raj and Morgan!

Best,

John Samellas, CEO MedSelfEd, Inc
Boston

Using Recurring Orders by Bold was one of the easiest steps in starting my subscription service. The stress I had put upon myself to figure out how to bill customers on a monthly (and other increments) basis was totally unnecessary. Within minutes, I had solved my biggest issue by simply downloading the app and having it installed on my site. Bold has been such a huge time-saver in starting my business, maintaining orders and payments, and keeping the wheels moving!

For starters, I haven't had to really utilize the support team- which is a great thing! I only had one question during setup that ended up being a coding issue on my site and not with the app. My inquiry through the Bold support team was addressed pretty immediately, which allowed me to coordinate with the coding issue.

Bold works Great! 
And the customer service team is one of the best ones I've ever encountered. They are very customer oriented and Raj and Morgan really went out of their way to solve my customization need ASAP. They not only fixed what I needed but they actually developed a way for me implement this myself whenever I needed it in new product for example and/or to remove it if I ever wanted to. 

When I needed to ask some questions a couple of weeks latter Raj actually took my chat himself and remembered my store and what they had done to it 2 weeks prior. Im extremlly happy with BOLD service and specially with the extra effort Raj and Morgan put into helping me.

PS...for customers in Mexico Bold is THE ONLY SUBSCRIPTION SOLUTION that works with Mexican payment gateways.
We finally launched our site with the amazing support of the Bold Apps team! Great app but even better support :)
Great app!  Set up and forget about it.  They do the work for you.  Watch the money come in
Great apps and quality customer service. Thanks!
4 stars because i cancelled before implementing its service but i gave it 4 starts because their customer service is excellent...when sales and product line improves i WILL be reinstalling their app

I just started using y'all. We had a really successful Kickstarter campaign but unfortunately the 1500+ backers we had won't be auto-renewed. We tried setting up Shopify with PayWhirl after our Kickstarter but it was too ugly for our design-focused products. When I found y'all (via Shopify customer service) I immediately loved the amazing aesthetics of everything y'all do.

We're about to hit the launch button — but I'm already so excited about the way recurring products are going to be a game-changer for us. Thank you so much!

I got to hop on the phone with Brandon from y'all's team. He was willing to listen to my questions, talk through solutions — and even called me back when he found a BETTER solution than the one he's immediately given me.
The app itself is good, but it made a lot of hardcoded changes to my theme files that were quite difficult to remove after I got rid of the app. Make a back-up before you download this app!!!

We love Recurring Orders from Bold. Easy to use, highly recommended, amazing.
The team at Bold Commerce is above and beyond! We couldn't be happier and more satisfied with the amount of support we received from them. Superb app! Great features and was able to customise it well to my needs which were relatively far from the "default use case". And for the pieces I had trouble customising I got superb support from the Bold team. Strong recommendation!

The app works great.  The reason for my five-star review is that the people on their support chat service are great.  When something isn't working like it should, they know what they're doing and they get it fixed.

We use this app for our monthly subscription service. Recently I had an issue and had to contact customer service. They were super responsive and helpful with every question I had. I would use another app from them 100%
worst app in the world, cost me 1000000

At first glance, everything seems to be working fine. BUT, there are some major issues you should take a look at before you start using Bold Recurring Orders.

1. Checkout process is a black box. You don't have a way to find our who interrupts the checkout process and why.
2. This is more critical! Bold changed something which broke triggering webhooks from Shopify. When you do things, you sometimes broke something, and that's fine. BUT, the issue is Bold support said I have to be in touch with Shopify reps to fix this!? Bold changed something which broke webhooks and they ask from their customer to deal this issue with Shopify!?!?

STAY AWAY FROM THIS COMPANY!!!

Too confusing.  Need 3rd party for payment and order maintenance as well as having to install code on your web site.
Couldn't get time scheduled for a phone call for over a week.

Great so far.  I am honestly writing this review to say how great the customer support has been.  I just installed the app yesterday and was contacted right away by customer support.  I needed assistance installing the liquid code and they stepped right up and installed it quickly, with no issues that I have encountered so far.    They also sent emails with training material that made it super easy to understand how to work the app.  Brenden stayed in touch with me through the entire process, keeping me up to speed on what was happening.  Awesome support.  Now, on to selling subscriptions.  :)

Really great so far! I've been asking Robb HEAPS of questions and he's been super patient with me and is really helping me with getting set up! Looking forward to getting it rolling in the next few days, but if Robb's support is anything to go by, it's going to be a great experience! Will update as I get further down the path..

Brenden Porcher started helping me out 9/25/17 on a chat. Brenden was very knowledgeable about RO. Without wasting my time, Brenden suggested we set up a call for the following day. Brenden then took the time to book a call for me that was outside his normal call times. 9/26 I received my call from Brenden at the exact correct time, not a minute late. Recurring Orders as been a great addition to our store, www.manemanagement.com.  Our customers love the app even though they have no idea of the inner workings.  It just works seamlessly with our store!
Awesome app! I use it on my clothing rental site and have not had any problems yet. Definitely recommend !!
Easy set up. I do recommend this app.

We were looking at an easy way to sell monthly boxes and this app really helped us achieve this easily. Clients can manage their rexurring orders easily and we can send products easily each months to clients.

This app has been integral in our operations, and I am very happy upon discovering it 2 weeks before opening our online store! Set-up wasn't difficult. The customer service has been very helpful and responsive to all of my questions. I would highly recommend!

The team at Bold Commerce has been absolutely sensational! Special mention to Leanne who has helped us from our first enquiry and throughout the entire installation and customisation process, not to mention answering our endless questions. Great customer service!
Great App! 

Thanks Samantha for all your help and advice with Subscriptions and Discounts.

I had the pleasure of working with Brenden from TeamDream at Bold today and I could not be more pleased with our interaction.  Benden was engaging, knowledgeable and funny. He quickly helped me to update my complex theme so that it would work correctly with their recurring order product.  Of all the app companies we have used so far in our business, Bold Apps has proven to be a cut above the rest. Job well done!

We launched our website about 10 years ago and people have been asking for auto ordering since its inception.  We deliver to different routes weekly and bi-weekly. People have always commented that it is such a pain to try and remember  to put in orders.  We have tried emailing them each week, but people get busy and always forget. Some people will remember after the cutoff time and beg for their orders to be filled late. 

When we switched our website platform to Shopify, a customer of ours suggested looking into your app. This auto ordering system has truly helped us manage our business more effectively.  Customers are loving it!  We had 13 customers sign up just in the first week we launched it and almost 40 by the end of the first month.  As people put in late orders, they are more likely to sign up for the automated system as well as it gives us another tool to use for people to get their orders in on time.  We have had nothing but positive feedback on the system thus far.  We really like the different reports that anticipate the sales volumes as well as being able to add notes to their accounts and make changes for customers that may feel uncomfortable with the system.

We are in the process of setting up my store and most of the apps used are from Bold Apps. Our website needs many customizations even with some of the Bold Aps (mostly with recurring orders). As a result, I don't even remember how many annoyable tickets we have created. All of those tickets always resolved not only on time but with other possible solutions provided if some modifications cannot be done in the nearest future. 
The support team is very responsive and probably the best on the whole Shopify marketplace. 
The other thing which is most favorable is that you can install almost any app and enjoy it for free for 30 days….even for 60-90 days in some cases. This gives you enough time to understand all the features and make all necessary website adjustments.
Wish Bold team to keep the same highest level of service and quality of their apps.
As was said above, the Bold app mostly used in our store is Recurring Orders&Subscriptions. Great App and easy to use. If you need a light customisation for your store it was done very quickly for us. Looking forward when the team launches open access API for this app in order to be integrated with other apps more flawlessly.

I've been using Bold for a couple of months - setting up but have not gone live yet. It can be a little confusing at first, as with setting up any complex apps, there will be a bit of a learning curve. But I have to say the customer support has been excellent. The team is responsive, very friendly and knowledgeable. If I have a problem, the support team has always helped me resolve the issue. You can email them if you have an issue and they reply pretty quickly (sometimes within 10 mins), but if you have an urgent issue, you can even ask for a call-back, which many smaller apps on Shopify does not provide. So far so good!

I am just getting started with Bold products but I am loving the customer support and looking forward to many years of being a Bold customer.

The support team answered quickly even in the evening when I have had to wait days for responses from other companies. I appreciate the attentiveness. Thank you!

Big shout-out to Team Dream at BOLD.  We had a few minor issues arise when installing the app due to our theme being customized.  They jumped on chat immediately to respond to our q's and had integration specialists work on our theme immeidately to fix the problem and get us live.  Definitely recommend BOLD's app's to any store owner looking for solid follow-up service when needed.

I would highly recommend this app to anyone considering integrating it into their online store. Not only is it easy to implement on the back end (took me about 3 days!), its extremely customer friendly on the front end. Our customers don't hesitate to reach out to let us know they are having a hard time with new features on the site (i.e. subscriptions) and we have received very few questions so far and seen great success with the app. Their customer service is fantastic (thanks, Leanne!)! We just installed two more apps from this group, I can't wait to work with them more in the future!
Awesome customer service. app works great!
Easiest app for reoccurring orders that I've found so far. good customer service. thank you
Great app and awesome customer service.

The team at Bold was extremely helpful in helping us make a switch from Recharge to their recurring app. Any questions that I had (and I had many) were answered within a few hours if not within minutes. The customer service team is very prompt to respond to any issues and have always been able to resolve any issues we have had fairly quickly as well.

James and Robb were a huge help to our site!!!!! James helped us switch over from ReCharge because it was an absolute distaster. He made the transition seamless and was extremely responsive! The Em and Liz team cannot express how grateful we are to James, Morgan, Robb and the Bold team!! We love Bold!
Super great app, easy to use and support is top notch. Thanks

Their code screwed up my theme, the way it delivers pictures on the product pages. Despite multiple assurance from BOLD that their code "was uninstalled and could not possibly cause this issue", it turned out it was their fault, and they had failed to remove all code. Very unprofessional! They left me high and dry and lied to me. See below email from shopify support. Shopify had to fix BOLD's mess.

Maggie (Shopify) 
Sep 11, 11:10 EDT 
Hi Christian,
Thank you for your ongoing patience while our team looked into the issue.
The Theme Support Team responded back to me saying that it was in fact Bold's code that was causing the issue. This might now cause the app not to work as intended. Theme Support has suggested that you will need to either revert your product-template.liquid file back to the beginning and use another app or reach out to Bold for more help. I'm honestly not sure myself how these things work, so I'm not sure how the Bold Team missed this, but I'm sure they might like to know in case it happens again.
Let me know if you have any other questions.
Thanks and have a good one.

The Bold Recurring Orders App has revolutionized the way I conduct my business. I run a business that allows customers to create custom multipacks of fitness and nutrition bars on a subscription model.  After launch, I had a few months of very low sales. I realized that a lot of my issues were due to a poor user interface which created roadblocks for the customer to complete their purchase. Having little to no coding experience myself, I began reaching out to developers to get quotes on building an easier to use UI. As the quotes began rolling in, I quickly became demoralized due to the high cost and large amount of time that would be needed to implement the changes I had visualized. As I was on the precipice of determining what was next for me and my site, I discovered The Recurring Orders Build a Box functionality!  As I learned more about the feature I had to ask if I was dreaming because it included everything that I had visualized for my site!  This out of the box solution makes it easy for my customers to customize their own subscription box while presenting the details of each box option to make their decisions that much easier. I can easily say that Bold has saved me thousands of dollars, not to mention weeks of work, that I otherwise would have spent working with a developer.  Bold has given me a site that I am truly proud of and excited to say that I am a part of.  I don't know if my site would still be around today if it weren't for Bold and the Recurring Orders team.

Working with the Bold support team has been seamless! When I originally made the switch to begin using the Build a Box function, I struggled to get the correct options to show up.  I reached out to the support team late Friday night, not expecting a response until the next week, but to my surprise someone reached back out to me on Saturday and got my ticket moving.  Early Monday morning I was contacted again and was told that I was using an old version of liquid which was preventing the new functionality from working.  The support rep took it upon himself to update all of my code to the newest version and I was good to go before I would have even expected a first reply from any other customer service team.  Over the next few days I encountered a couple of (probably very basic) liquid issues, and the support team took the time to coach me through the changes I was looking to make - offering service which was above and beyond what I expected of them.  Overall, the support team created a very memorable experience and left me to walk away proud and excited for what's next in the evolution of my business!

Being able to offer subscriptions of my products to my customers is a game changer for my business. My typical buyer buys 1.5x, with the Bold Subscription App, my goal is now to increase that by 200%. That is a game changer.

Hello Fellow Shopify Store Owners,

So, I initially downloaded the BOLD Recurring Order App and set up several aspects or features, most notable are the subscription groups of course... I really love these... I have two on my website, www.MarqueeCandles.com... one group is set up for customers to purchase individual candles on a recurring order - subscription basis... or they can purchase an individual candle all on its own, the widget is AWESOME.. it looks just like the "One Time Purchase" or "Subscription" option you might see on Amazon.com.. So, I love it.. as this is a feature that potential customers are familiar with. 

Secondly, i set up another group for a product which has Subscription as the only offering to customers.. Both groups work seamlessly...the widgets on the product pages are brilliant.. I say that because i love the fact that you can customize the look with color attributes and line color and much more... Both groups work smoothly when checking out... you can have both; subscription purchased items in the shopping cart, as well as individual -one time purchased items in the cart... 

Another thing, the Recurring Orders App requires you to designate the merchant account you want to use to process the order... I set up the BrainTree account (which by the way is a subsidiary of Paypal so its a trusted merchant service provider), but i ultimately decided to use the Stripe merchant account for checkout processing of Recurring Subscription Orders as it simply deposits monies into my business checking account... so it works just fine for me that way. But now i have the option of changing to BrainTree if I ever want to... The App also offers access or integration with a plethora of other merchant providers, most I don't know anything about... 

Anyway, another aspect I like about this App is that you can offer customers Discount codes. As you know you can create discounts in your Shopify store, but you can also offer customers Discount codes you create in the Recurring Orders App... and the beauty is that the two different discount codes do not overlap... meaning the Shopify discount codes will not be recognized and honored if someone enters one at checkout if the same code is not set up in the Recurring Orders App... At first this might sound like its a Negative against the App but its not....because think about it this way.. in your regular store you may offer discount codes or promotions for individual items... say 10% off a candle we sell, but since we are offering subscriptions to customers which already contain discounts, we don't want the customer to be able to take an additional 10% off of the already discounted subscription price.. so this is Genius if you ask me... It gives you total control over the pricing, the discounts and keeping what you offer customers separate... 

Now, there was one issue I thought I HAD with this App which turned out to be false... so this may help to know too... but i need to first preface it with this statement.. i am not an Internet SEO guru okay? I am good at it to a point but i have limits and I say this because I ran a speed test on my site after loading this App and three others to my store... and Pingdom and GTMetrix both gave my site a Lower than average Grade for Website load time. When I first researched the reasons, some of them included the following: Downloads across hostnames, then there were Combine External JavaScript mentions, then there were Remove query strings mentions... Sooooo....thinking the BOLD App and the other Apps were the problem... what did I do... I uninstalled all of them believing this will fix my website load time... WELL.... here is where the wake up call comes in... I re-ran the tests and guess what there was only nominal improvement in my site load speed... i discovered, that had i taken more time to look at the analysis i would have found the first time that my biggest issue was not the BOLD App or other Apps at all but rather the file size of my photos on the site and the need to serve photos at an already smaller size so the CSS script or whatever it is doesn't have to shrink them, thereby forcing the load time to be longer because the code has to execute a command to shrink a photo before loading a website when called upon on the internet... 

Soooo... HUGE lesson learned here... because I loved the BOLD APP.... ENTER.. My Re-Installation  =0) 

I then reinstalled the Recurring Orders & Subscription App and had a minor tweek that needed to be adjusted over Father's day weekend, so i submitted a ticket to BOLD... and thought I would not hear back until Monday or Tuesday. Well, guess what.... Not only did I hear back from the BOLD App staff, i got an immediate fix from Raj.... ( Raj you are the MAN! ) Thanks again for your dedication and help over that weekend... He fixed my issue in no time at all and responded to me immediately. Then on Monday another team member from Bold addressed the Ticket as follows up to make sure it was all working... 

I really cant say enough good things about my experience with this BOLD App and its designers or staff members... Probably the biggest take aways for you, my fellow Shopify store owners, are these two points.... 

1. This App works GREAT... and it has tons of other features like Analytics, Reports, Recurring Cart Orders,  Build-A-Box (which I love as this will fit with another business I have), Manage Customers with recurring orders, Manage Products - which will give you a forecast of the inventory you need in the future to cover subscriptions, plus even though I'm not using it, you can set up Discounts in the Bold App which are not offered in your actual Shopify store discount system as I mentioned above.

2. The second most important take away is this... CUSTOMER SERVICE THAT RESPONDS... yes its in Caps because i want to emphasize this... we have all downloaded Apps off the Shopify App Store only to discover a product that is faulty or we need help with installation and then WHAM.... there is no one there to help you.... Well, BOLD gets 10 stars in Customer Service not only because of my Father's Day weekend fix by Raj, but because BOLD will actually install the Recurring Order App in your store for you.. you just have to give them the limited access they need and BOOM they do it.. (Note here... I thought i could do the initial install on my own and got to step 7 and found out.. "okay this part i cant do") I contacted BOLD requesting help with my initial installation and within hours I had responses from Jordan, Leanne & Victoria.... They were on top of it and Jordan finished off the install and then i had a follow up from Brenden....

Guys.. (ie.. shopify store owners) I know all this sounds like overkill filled with praise, but its all true and happened just as I outlined it.. and lets be honest you are a consumer okay, a store owner in the Shopify App market, and as a consumer you are not just buying a product you expect to work but you are buying the service that supports it... and BOLD nails this on both levels.. my hats off to BOLD... and I don't say that lightly because I am a picky consumer... I will take a product back to a store in a minute if there is a problem with it or I will contact customer service if i need their advertised help.. and if i dont get it, i simply return the product and move on to the next guy willing to take my money who will give me what i want.. and that is why I am pleased with BOLD... I plan to add other Apps they have as my orders increase so the Apps can pay for themselves.. but at this time this is the one I have.. and it does what it is supposed to... My Thanks to Victoria, Jordan, Leanne, Raj and Brenden and your colleagues for a great Product and equally great Service.

I hope this was helpful to anyone considering this App... again i know its long but given the premium quality of the App and the Customer Service Bold provides this review is the least they deserve.

Have a good one and best of luck with your Shopify Store. I highly recommend using the Recurring Order App by BOLD if you have a need or desire to set up products for Recurring Orders/Subscriptions.

Kind Regards,
Chris

Bold Recurring Orders & Subscriptions has been a great addition to our Shopify store. From the back end it is very easy to use and gives you all the information you could want. I've rated the app only 4 stars for the following reasons.

(1) Bold performed the install and didn't properly test to make sure the code worked with our shops theme. This resulted in iOS users not being able to check out and purchase and took a couple of days to deduce the problem. However they worked with us to find a mutual resolution to this problem.

(2) Customizing the look and feel of the check out and order confirmation emails can be a little cumbersome but not the worst. 

(3) It is a personal pet peeve of mine when Shopify Apps say $19.99/month and then in the fine print mention that they take 1% of the order value. Not to mention that Bold only makes the 1% known on their website and not the Shopify App store website. This is annoying and if your app is good enough you shouldn't worry about the 1% people will inevitably use it if it adds value.

If you want a subscription service definitely choose Bold Commerce. It isn't perfect but its the best you're going to get and with the right questions/requests you'll get it up and running without a hitch.

After much frustration with Shopify for not caring enough to make subscriptions native to their platform and a disappointing experience with a competing app in the repeat billing space, Recurring Orders & Subscriptions by Bold really came to the rescue. One quick phone call and they had us up and running in about an hour. Their level of customer service and technical support blows the other apps out of the water.

I will update this review once things have settled: it will either stay at 3 stars or go up to 5.
So far, the app works as intended but its features are not very well adapted to our particular needs - we deliver organic veggies to customers' door. We struggle with the fact that the app sets weekly/bi-weekly deliveries based on the date the customer bought the subscription, rather than the date the customer wants his veggies delivered. There is a bug that prevents customers from adding products to their subscription. We had to pick the Recurring Cart option, which doesn't have the Swap feature. Having one of the veggies out of stock stops the order from being generated, whereas we would just swap the missing veggie for a similar one at the warehouse. Plus a few little annoying things.
BUT - so far, Bold's support has been excellent. Its technical team is working on the bug, Victoria and others are extremely responsive. I will have to pay for customization work, but I do understand this app is designed to serve most of the needs of most users. I am hopeful that once my issues are resolved, I will be able to leave a 5-star review.

Newbie Bliss !!

Let's face it, we've all had to start at the beginning in everything we do. Going into business for yourself is no different.

That first day, when you sit at your desk, tuck in your chair, flex your wrists and then stare at your screen waiting for some insight into what you are going to do next.

It's a frightening prospect. When you run your own business you are putting yourself our there to be judged. Will people like my products and services? Will people like me? How to I structure my catalog? How do I deal with buyers from different states and countries? How do I retain my customers?

All the thousands of questions you have to answer it is this last one that is perhaps the most crucial one.

We need to WOW our customers. We need to create an unbeatable customer experience and a large part of this can be achieved through the purchasing experience you have.

Imagine running a business, where you rely on customers buying from you month in, month out, or quarter in, quarter out. Then imagine the frustration from those customers if you insisted on sending an invoice for payment for each transaction cycle.

That is one FAST WAY to lose your customers.

The buying experience that is enabled by the BOLD RECURRING ORDERS means that I can offer my customers the SUBSCRIPTION EXPERIENCE OF A LIFETIME.

It puts all the control into my hands, while creating total ease of purchase and tracking for my customers.

It wouldn't be possible for my business to operate without a recurring order feature. Believe me, I did the research and BOLD offers the best. A powerful, fully supported, totally integrated subscription solution that I couldn't live without.

So far so good.

Highly recommend

This little app is so powerful, when someone inadvertently uninstalled it, the CEO was crushed, just the ability to have customers able to create their own re-occurring monthly orders has worked so well she paid for IT Consulting overtime in order to assess the issue and fix it. Low and behold, with a little poking around I found what app it was, found residual information on the invoices/customers regarding the App and with only a few emails back and forth it was up and running again very quickly. under a half a day! Being a coder for life and been working on the Internet since the beginning (early 90's) I found it not only very powerful but in terms of being a new coder to this project that was built way before I even started working for the client and that it only took a handful of hours for just me to find out what the App. was, what happened and now fixed, I am amazed! I only exchanged a few emails and got it back up and running, and as for the client, exstatic that all prior information was still within the store that has been running for a few years it would appear. I must say, I am having Support do a run through the site/app as I am new to it but see how important it is to the client I want to make sure I got everything lost back and no conflicting issues come abbout. But, to be truth of my thinking is for the clients ease, as an app this easy to assess and trouble shoot I am confident enough that I can leave it running without a second thought that something else is wrong. And to think, I am on another clients WordPress site that they decided to turn off every Plug-in and the whole site was down so they called me in, and I turned them all on and it was still down, I had to go one by one and I am still finding some issues with the site after a MONTH and over 55 plugins having about half of them not even being used does not help. THANKS FOR A SOLID APP! Kudos! Great job in this app. will be exploring your other apps. for this and future clients with strong recommendations.

I wish I could give this app a better rating but I can't - 0/5 at this point. This app is fine if you have a handful of customers. When you have 100 or more, you're in BIG trouble. There is no way to make a change to the order billing date for more than 1 customer at a time. That's right - you have to click in and out of customer profiles so many times to make a very basic change. This makes for a time consuming activity, where you will spend HOURS and HOURS adjusting one customer's billing settings at a time. I've requested a feature to change the billing/order date for more than one customer many times and I get ignored. I pay about $100 a month ON TOP OF the already flat rate because I have so many subscribers. I spend HOURS and hours adjusting billing dates, based on new subscriber imports, which is just terrible. I have asked very nicely that a basic feature like this be installed. Instead, I have been ignored and told I need to pay additional fees for something like this. Something as basic as a bulk/mass change should be included in a VERY expensive app. DO NOT RECOMMEND.

My company uses Bold Subscription at www.noje.biz - check it out if you'd like to see the functionality in action.  I'd definitely recommend this app to anyone looking to offer a subscription service on their e-commerce site.  Their customer support team has been super responsive and helped resolve a couple small bugs within a day or 2.  This app definitely has more features and flexibility than the other subscription apps out there, so I'm definitely pleased.

This app also makes it super easy to offer customers discounts & other incentives to help boost your subscribers.  I really love the insights it gives into your subscriber base as well, and there are so many options for customer emails you can send out it's almost overwhelming (in a good way)!

There are a few missing features and/or quirks with the app that I would love to see changed in a future update (fingers crossed):

1: If my customer opts to pre-pay for a subscription the app takes them straight to checkout instead of adding the item to the cart and having them keep shopping.  This works for some of the items in my store, and may help some store owners with conversion rates, but most of my items are pretty low margin and I would prefer my customers subscribe to more than 1 thing.  This has lead me to remove the prepaid option from my site.

2: I would REALLY love to be able to set a minimum dollar amount for subscription items in my customer's cart.  With my business, if my customer subscribes to, say, a single chocolate bar, I would likely lose money due to packaging costs.  If I could set a condition that the customer must have at least $25 of product in their cart to subscribe, I'd be very happy.

3: The app has you choose between offering a subscription either on the individual items in your store, or on the full cart at checkout.  When I did the install I thought I would be able to offer both, but unfortunately that isn't the case.  This is kind of limiting in my UI and reduces my customers' ability to sign up for subscriptions.  I'd like to be able to offer subscription both on the product page, AND the cart checkout page to encourage people to subscribe.

Like I said before, this is the best subscription app out there and customer service has been so incredible.  Thanks, Bold!

Here is why this app is worth a 1 star rating.

I installed the app 3 weeks ago after reading endless 5 star reviews.  As a fellow Canadian company I was excited to support an app built in Canada.  This is what I experienced.

After first installing the app I had a problem with the orders not going to the recurring order checkout.  I contacted support and was told that someone would take a look at it.  I received an email back informing me that everything was fixed.  It wasn't.  I contact support again and let them know I was still having a problem with the orders not showing up properly in the shopping cart.  I was told that they would fix the issue and make my store a seamless experience.  That didn't happen.  While they did fix the issue of the CURRENT products going to the correct shopping cart, any new product I created would still go to the Shopify cart.  I decided to call the support and was told that someone would contact me later that night or the next morning.  That has not happened (it is now day 3).  I have had to delay my store opening by 2 weeks already and am now facing a third week.  

Throughout this time I have been sent emails pandering for me to leave a positive review, starting when I first downloaded the app and hadn't even used it.  The fact that you beg for positive reviews should have been a red flag and explains why you currently have a 5 start rating in Shopify apps.  

I will happily be uninstalling the app this week and look forward to working with recharge for my recurring subscription needs.  This entire experience has been awful.

I am in the process of switching my current customers from the system of Infusionsoft to Bold. It all started when everyone on my customer service team was insanely unhappy using IS, and I was looking for an alternative. Shopify recommended Bold, and I decided to give it a try. 

The first thing I really like about Bold, besides the fair pricing, is that it allows my customers to manage their own accounts/subscriptions. This is huge! It also has not had any hang ups or glitches like our old system - like kicking people off subs or moving them to a new one of its own mind! 

My customer service team is able to create accounts for our customers who aren't as tech-savvy by simply doing so by logging out of the system, and getting their information and entering it over the phone. This way we can go in later and manage it however necessary if they continue to not want to do so themselves or otherwise can't. (I wish we could do this from inside the system, but Bold has told us that they don't allow that for security of personal info purposes.) 

Being able to use a modern system that easily integrates with Shopify is life-changing for me. My customers are happy and my customer service employees are happy and that's huge and more than I could ever ask for. Thanks, Bold! I am looking forward to the many added features and updates Bold adds that will only improve everyone's experience from here!
Thanks, Brenden - appreciate all the assistance!
So far so good! Just installed it last week. But the support is beyond excellent for setting up this app. Shout out to Henry for his help!

I love that it takes the guess work out of the subscription process for me AND my customers! It's easy to navigate and someone who isn't into coding or internet heavy lifting can still use it. It works great with my e-commerce store AND with useful shipping options--which is a shop owners dream. I've contacted customer support more than once and they've been helpful and attentive. Cody and Kyle are rockstars and help me regularly!! A big thanks to BOLD for great customer service!

This app has amazing functionality.  It does require a little more setup, it's not plug and play, but the ease of use and the level functionality as a customer and a store owner is unparalleled.  It is worth the effort if you have a strong and growing business.

We have been using another subscription app that will be unnamed, and all of our grievances with that app are being solved by us switching over, and I literally mean ALL of them.  Customers can ship upcoming orders immediately, easily substitute products, have more control over their delivery schedule, can easily change their shipping option/method, and so much more.  On our end, we can do things like substitute products that are comparable, give discount codes to existing subscribers, send them more comprehensive e-mail notifications with more triggers, and again, so much more, things we never could do before.  The discount code system in this app is based on Shopify's system, and we think it's superior.

One of my favorite features is that this app can force customers to sign up for an account, but only if they are subscribing.  Before, we would have had to force all customers to sign up for accounts, even for 1-time purchases, or none at all.  It forced us to either increase our subscription support tickets or reduce sales.  The problem is that so many subscribers didn't know where to go to adjust their subscription because they never signed up for an account, which caused a lot of problems.

Our old subscription app also had squat for reporting, so now we can really see how our sales and subscribers are growing with projected revenue.  We can also refund people in the app for returns rather than going into the payment gateway (like stripe), and it updates the order in shopify to reflect this, whereas our old app did not, requiring us to manually add notes to the order.  The level of customization with CSS/HTML is also wonderful, so we can make everything look beautiful on our store.  

It's also worth noting that Bold has incredible customer support, so if you run into issues or have questions, they are there for you.  To Victoria and everyone else that helped us, thank you!  If you have great ideas for features, they will listen and continue to improve upon their apps.  Plus, for the price they charge for these highly functional apps is 100% worth investing in.

We compared Bold to our current subscription app over a year ago, and now we sorely regret not switching then.  It seemed on par, but we clearly didn't do our homework.  Though the transition will be difficult in switching apps (and be warned if you're switching, this is not easy), we know it's worth it in the end.  What Bold has done to this app is incredible, and now we are installing several more of their apps to do product bundles, wholesale, and so much more.
Awesome...Just started with it and easy to navigate.  Support is dialed in to maximize ease of use

Also, for some reason the %off for pre-paying in advance does not display correctly to the customer when they select longer frequencies to obtain a lower discount. One of the other downsides is that customers have to leave their account on your website to go to an external site to manage their orders. Lastly, and the biggest reason I am giving a 3 star, is that it would be nice to have a simple function to charge the customer full price for the 1st subscription, and then give a nice discount for their 2nd and ongoing orders. This would help ween out a lot of those folks that just signup for the initial discount and then cancel a week later claiming they signed up by accident. If support pulls thru on those other two issues and they make the app a bit functional towards a variety of ways to setup, then I may bump my rating up a star or so... Overall though, I do see where this app is something I want to continue using because I have set my current orders up in a way that I think will bring good steady revenue, as I have had some success in the past with similar apps.

This app works great. Easy set-up and easy for customers to sign up and manage their own subscriptions. Super-easy for us to manage their subscription, too! We used to use PayPal for subscriptions and couldn't make simple changes for customers (such as adding another bag of coffee) due to PayPal limitations. This app makes it easy to keep our customers happy!

We've been using this for months with great success. Our business is unique and requires unique solutions - we use this app to automate our diaper service orders. We jumped from PayWhirl to this and have been glad ever since. 

WHAT I LOVE: 
- My customers can manage their own service. They login, skip weeks, swap subscriptions, all without calling or emailing me! If they choose to contact me, I can update everything manually. 
- The features keep getting better. There were a few key functions that I asked for in the beginning (like being able to manually add coupons for existing customers) that have been added now. BOLD is really listening and pumps out improvements all the time. 
- Gift/Prepaid subscriptions. Awesome. With this, I can also offer a discount for prepaid subscriptions, which means cash flow! 
- One checkout - customers can subscribe AND make one-time purchases all at the same time. The customer facing side is awesome.
- Custom automate emails that can be branded (withing reason). My customers love the touch points
- Consistent charge times. For me, at 8:07 every am the orders for that day come through. I'm not sure if this is intentional, but I love being able to depend on it. Slurp down the rest of my coffee and get moving!
- I can manually select start dates for subscriptions. 
- BOLD customer service has been stellar. Helped with a liquid issue, very responsive, honest, and want me to succeed. 

What I'm looking forward to seeing: 
- full Shopify gift card integration. Currently I work around this manually by cancelling the gift card and issuing a coupon for the amount, which is a slight PITA. 
- Minimum recurring order option - I'd like to make the customer buy a block of prepaid orders up front and then keep going. This option will be A+ for services like mine or a consultant or business coach.

Greetings. Basically what we do is sell wine!  In our region, the online wine selling environment is cero, and all online retailers that are available do not ship to our area.  We started researching the industry, researching the users, and we found out an interesting insight.  Regular users would prefer to have in stock their favorite wine always, and not have to go search where it is available in the brick and mortar stores.  So we developed this web site, where users could buy one time ones, but also could put in a recurring order of that special wine they want to have always in their house/office.

Recurring Orders helped us fulfill that specific insight that customers were looking for, and when combining it with the Membership APP it gave us the ability for not only delivering on that insight, but to also have special membership offers to those uses. 

The combination of this two apps is explosive!

Thanks so much for creating them!

We were using a hand-coded system which did not integrate with shipping.  You can imagine the hassle!  Everything had to be requested via email, from skipping shipments to changing shipping addresses.  If that wasn’t enough to make us fling ourselves down a steep flight of stairs, we had to manually charge each customer every month. 

Now that we have moved to Shopify and Bold's Recurring Orders & Subscriptions, it’s a different story.  We are integrated with shipping, subscription charges happen automatically, and our customers can do so much for themselves now!  We’ve heard already how empowering it is for them to be able to change their own billing/shipping addresses, frequency of shipping, swap out cat product preference, or cancel a shipment.  So, overall, we look like heroes.  Our customers love us, and it’s all because of you guys.  Every single day feels like we are a Disney Princess.  We sing, and birds fly in and make our beds while squirrels do the dishes.  THAT’S how you make us feel.  Magical.

Additionally, we no longer try to fling ourselves down steps…for the most part.

I liked this app a lot when I first began using it! It has a great interface and is fairly intuitive. It also has pretty solid customization options for creating a variety of subscription packages.

But a rather annoying issue came up recently- I had a customer call me for the first subscription order I ever received over the phone. Most customers usually order online. She really didn't feel like placing it on the site, so I was happy to help her place the order over the phone.

I went into the back-end of my Shopify site, as suggested by Shopify for placing phone orders (placing a high volume of orders through the front end of your site can cause it to be flagged, as all of those sales end up being tied to one IP address). After I placed, fulfilled, and shipped the order, I noticed it did not come up in the Bold Recurring Orders app. I chatted with them shortly after, only to find out that manually entering orders into the back-end of Shopify does not communicate with their application. Mind you, the product I sold was a pure subscription-only product. This was something I was certainly not expecting, and made me lose some confidence in the app.

Long story short, I ended up being left out to dry and was only able to charge my customer's card one time for one month of a recurring subscription she was very excited to receive. There is no remedy for orders placed this way through this Bold app- and it made my company look bad in my opinion. It's quite an embarrassing phone call to make. Luckily, I just started running AdWords campaigns around my subscription offer- or else this issue could have scaled massively.

I hope someone reads this and is able to avoid the annoying situation I am currently dealing with! I might switch apps, depending on the quantity of phone orders I get for my krill oil subscription going forward. If you don't plan on getting phone orders, this app should work quite well for your store!

Good luck :)

The Confessional Boutique Wine Revelations is a group of small batch, boutique winemakers in McLaren Vale, South Australia. In each case, our producers are passionate about their wines and more often than not their wines are a reflection of their own personality as well as the vagaries of seasons, regional characteristics and grape varieties.

At our cellar door we recently launched the Illuminati Club - which offers members exclusive invites, wine releases and discounts. When members join up they select the frequency they wish their recurring wine order to arrive and with their first order they are sent sent a welcome letter, free gift and the Illuminati talisman.

We have been using Shopify for a while now for our online store and when we launched the Illuminati Club we were desperately looking for a way to have the same order process online that we do at the cellar door - so we were delighted when we found out about the Recurring Orders app from Bold!

Basically our starting point was we wanted to be able to entice new members online and do this by showing them the price advantage that they would get by joining the Illuminati Club. Showing a discount price is not hard (we could have done this ourselves) but the hard part is to have a simple system that lets people sign up to the club, select how often they want their order to arrive, automatically generate the order, process payment and assign our Illuminati Club members into specific tags/groups in our customer database. On top of this we wanted a way that our Illuminati could manage their own recurring orders that gives them the flexibility to manage their own subscription and recurring orders and have a system that we could forecast our recurring sales. 

The Recurring Orders App from Bold does all this and more and runs our Illuminati Club like a dream!

If you are looking for an app that seamlessly works with Shopify, easily manages recurring orders across all different types of products or carts, is straight forward  to set up and will grow your business then this app is for you.

We have not had to deal directly with the support team to date but in terms of the support and set up documentation provided it was great!

Like most Shopify apps, there is a bit of configuring required to set up and customise the Recurring Orders app but this is easily managed in-house. The install documentation and help text is very clear and we were able to easily install and configure the app ourselves.
This app adds much needed functionality to Shopify and the team at BOLD was a great help to get the setup perfect.
Great app! Super easy to install and the staff is very helpful with any questions about functionality and design.

The only negative i found to date is that it doesn't integrate with Shopify Payments and we had to open a Stripe account despite Shopify Payments being already powered by Stripe. Highly recommended if you're looking for the best subscription app.

We use recurring orders by Bold at www.coffeecanopy.com.  It's a great app that allows us to provide subscription options to our customers.  This app has it all:

So, I'm a small scale grass-fed beef and pasture-raised pork farmer in rural Nova Scotia.  I have been for 10 years now, and for 10 years the big challenge has always been how does little ol me, in a world where big player grocery stores have the people all trained to drive to one place and get everything they could possibly dream of, find the customers who still want to know where their food really comes from.  The problem is that it's inconvenient for them to drive to my farm in the middle of nowhere, so my first thought is that I'll make an online retail shop, take orders, and then I'll get the products to them, several customers at one time.  But the issue for them is that it's still not as convenient for them because they eat more than just meat, and they'd like to get other foods locally too.  So my idea becomes to source more local products from all my farmer friends, and I'll put it on my store and bring it to our customers too.  But EVERY farmer has a different weekly routine, and it becomes almost impossible to organize a communication routine to place our weekly customer orders to the various farmers--they all have different production schedules. This problem almost thwarted the business idea, because the small independent dairy farmer just needed more lead time when they were pouring the milk and making the yogurt!  Then I discovered Recurring Orders from BOLD!  This changed everything!  Now customers can just make a standing order for a set period of time, and we are able to give the dairy folks plenty of lead time!  Not only that, the customers can make standing orders for lots of their weekly food needs, and yet they still have the flexibility of making one-time orders any week they want for products we already have in inventory back at the farm.  So, we're able in a smaller scale than would ever be feasible to offer something as convenient as the old fashioned doorstep milk delivery, but without the scale needed to absorb order losses from order cancellations, and we can even bring all the other weekly groceries too!   Now this is a story of how appropriate technology can give back opportunity to small business, allowing the good things from the past to be new again.  Recurring Orders will be Re-generating our Nova Scotia economy, one happy locavore at a time!  Big greedy guys, we might take a little of your market!      

I don't have time to learn the liquid programming knowledge...not while there's cows to tend and fences to mend.  The opportunity for your teck-hand Mohammad to do it for me was MUCH appreciated!  Thanks man!  Your instructions were in delivered in perfect clarity and simplicity!  Just thanks!

I had a customer contact me about a problem with the app. I had him give me all the specifics and he even took screenshots of the errors, which I submitted along with my ticket to Bold a couple of days ago.

In the meantime I lost a $200+ monthly subscription since the customer can't complete the order, and I haven't' heard a peep beyond the automated we'll get back to you email.

The app itself seems ok if they can get it working, but the support is not up to par. I have however, gotten at least 4 or 5 emails offering to get free or discounted apps in exchange for leaving a review. I don't think this was what they had in mind.

We're writing this review having been a Bold apps user for nearly two years and having received good customer support until we met 'Recurring orders' Unfortunately the customer support we received was awful and its at times like this you get to know what a company is really like.

After 2.5 weeks and being told two time the app installation was all good we uninstalled the app.

The final nail in the coffin was the fact we could add a product to our cart and it showed the correct price, if you removed it and then added it again the app included it in your cart at a much lower randomly generated price!! quite an issue! We were advised by Kevin we would have to wait even longer for a fix and there may be some cache issue but it could be shopify or bold apps. We didnt even get an apology for the delay or an indication of how long it would take to be fixed, so we gave up.

After spending 30 minutes removing all the code we installed we then visited the app store and installed another subscription app, we didnt have two hours of copying and pasting code, just a press of the 'install' button and hey presto we were up and running. We even emailed their support team for a few custom tweaks and they were done instantly. Now thats what i call customer support!

The two experiences were at completely opposite ends of the spectrum. We will certainly be thinking twice about using any more Bold apps, which is a real shame.

Installation was a breeze.  Kevin was super supportive and eager/willing to help.  That is why they get a star.  They had 5 stars until our launch.  

Once we launched and people wanted to make changes to their accounts, that's when they lost 4 stars.  They would have lost 5 if Shopify would have allowed it.  There seems to be no sense of urgency to help us help our customers and that is a shame.  The issues are that customers either 1) can't log in and are told there is no account with their email address or 2) they can get in but it says they have no active subscription to cancel or change.  Both are super basic features that we were told this app had.  If the team made me feel that they cared and were working hard to help get it fixed, I would feel a little better.  Unfortunately, the jury is still out. 
....................................
UPDATE:  After finally getting in touch with someone (in a matter of hours once I, the owner, got involved) we were able to work together to figure out that if a customer does not set up an account when they make the purchase, they cannot manage their account (sounds obvious now but in the order process, you don't realize that you are not setting up an account).  In lieu of forcing registration and potentially losing sales, we will send out an email reminding customers to sign up on our site using the same email address they did for their subscription and then the management portion is super easy and self explanatory.  If anyone else is doing this a different way with success, please let me know.

The Recurring Orders app from Bold Apps has literally transformed our business.

We've been successfully selling coffee and tea online for years, but have never been able to set up a reliable and affordable subscription service, even though our customers were crying out for it! When Bold launched Recurring Orders, we jumped right in having used a number of other Bold apps before, and knowing how their support is pretty much unparalleled in the industry. The installation was straightforward, and within minutes (not even hours) the nuts and bolts of our new subscription business were in place. A couple of days building our catalogue and tweaking our store design and we were in business. We've grown from a site with a small base of loyal customers, to a behemoth in the world of subscriptions in no time! Our fulfilment team are having to find a bigger warehouse to keep shipping all the orders we're sending; but the beauty of it is that they don't even need to touch the app - it integrates so well with Shopify that the orders just come through like any other one-off order, and they just process them as such - perfect.

Our customers love the integration with their account, and the flexibility the system gives them to manage all aspects of their subscription (and our customer service team love the fact that life is a lot quieter for them with a great self-serve approach for our customers!) We've needed to reach our to Bold's support team for advice on a couple of things, and each time they've been incredibly quick to respond and send us in the right direction. Like all of their other apps, Bold's team fully understand their products, and take complete ownership of any questions or issues we encounter. As you've probably guessed, I would happily recommend Bold Recurring Orders to anyone with a Shopify store; even if your core business isn't repeat order focussed, the simple addition to your store's back end and the low monthly cost makes it a bit of a no-brainer, and a great proposition for your customers.

During the beta stage of the app, there were a few areas of the integration that weren't quite working with our theme. Bold's support team offered some great technical assistance with some Liquid coding errors on our site - absolutely nothing to do with the Recurring Orders app, and yet they offered free support without question. That's the kind of above-and-beyond support that'll keep us using the app indefinitely!

The developer universe can be a bit hit and miss when it comes to support, but once again Bold have shown what a truly professional team they are, who thoroughly believe in their products and will stand by their apps when assistance is required. Moving to Shopify's platform was the best thing we ever did for our business; installing Recurring Orders was a very close second!
Excellent app, Bold installed it for me and has been working great, Support was quick to solve any issues i had.   My automatic re- orders has gone off flawless. Thanks Bold

I've upgraded my 1-star review after finally talking to the developer. 

Know that after the initial order, every recurring order will default to select the cheapest available shipping method, regardless of which shipping method the customer chose.  For us this was a mess -- it was creating orders for local pickup 2 states away from where the customer lives, because that method happened to be free.

The app looks great and they said they're working to resolve the issue, but unfortunately we can't wait -- we've lost long-time customers over the mixups. We have to go back to ReCharge -- it has less features but their Customer Support was fast and excellent.  I do believe Bold Apps will ultimately get this issue resolved, but ask them first if you have concerns.

Bold’s Saves Lives! 

Crazy Critters specializes in Sugar Gliders & Hedgehogs (sweet and cuddly as well as prickly exotic pets that we have worked with for many years) and being a licensed USDA professional dealer we spend a lot of time with our customers teaching about the importance of food / diet choices and how this impacts their pets long term health. Time and time again we have seen exotic animals get sick and die from substandard "box store" foods and it always makes us so very sad so we started marketing the only high end food available that actually meets these exotic pets needs. But the problem was your average pet parent gets busy and often forgets that they need to order more "Wild Glider" exotic foods until it's to late! Then they call us frantic for answers about what to do or even worse they substitute one of those poor quality "box store" foods or let their little babies go without! We wanted to find an application that could help us help our customers and their pets by making the ordering process simple, fast, and easy! After looking for sometime we picked Bold's auto Recurring Ordering app and our customers love it because now they no longer have to worry or stress about getting food that their exotic pets need and love as now it comes every month like clockwork. We may never know for sure how many exotic pets have been saved by Bold’s app but we are sure it has helped make life more enjoyable and stress free for our customers while improving our financial bottom line. THANKS

Here's my experience: I am a new company just starting up with Shopify and looking for the best apps to please my customers. I read the features for this app and was really excited. After everything was installed I had multiple issues/glitches. I was ok with this as it's in Beta. 

Here's what I wasn't ok with, multiple customers on my side were having issues with the service. When I passed up the issues, I wasn't getting a response. I threatened a bad review after 7 days of no response and suddenly had 3 different people responding. 

As a new retailer, it's important for me to provide superior customer service to my awesome customers. The apps I choose have to have a strong customer service and support team as well, to make sure that I can get back to my customers and resolve issues. It wasn't my experience with this app. 

I removed this app and went with someone else before my subscription service gets too big. The new company has amazing customer service and I've spent a total of 1 hour on the phone with them while they integrated my system 12 hours after moving to the app.

I'm very reluctant to write bad reviews, but I think it's important that I share my experience because I wish I had read all the reviews (I didn't read the bad ones) or I would have made a more educated choice.
Excellent app, Bold installed it for me and has been working great, Support was quick to solve any issues i had. My automatic re- orders has gone off flawless. Thanks Bold
Great app! The Bold team has been very helpful and responsive to my questions

So far so good! I've been dying to drop Chargify for a more integrated solution that meshes with my non-recurring products. Brenden was awesome installing the liquid code for me and Holly has been very helpful. 

A few key features that I'd love to see but the app is still fairly new and they seem pretty open to adding requested features. This definitely seems like the long term solution though.

Have to test it in depth yet, but so far the experience has been phenomenal! Customer support couldn't be better: they answer your emails within minutes and one of their wizards has installed all the liquid code for free! Thank you for that Brenden! This app rocks!

Very disappointing app - many issues with this app - not fully integrating, recurring settings not working, customers not billed correctly, pricing of products wrong - we have been left with many orders for recurring orders which we cannot process or fulfill - the developers have not replied to any of our messages nor fixed any of the problems we have had with this app - we asked them to fix it or we will have to remove it from our shop and they removed it for us without even letting us know! Avoid at all costs unless you want loads of messed up orders and total chaos with your customers!!!!

Where to start? Well, installation was a breeze - it only took a few minutes to get the app up and running. Then Shazam! Re-loaded a product page and there was the subscription option complete with my "10% the purchase price today" incentive. We are giving the App a 30 day test before signing up for the premium but so far so good. I will write another review at the end of the 30 days, letting everyone know how the subscriptions performed.
So far I love this app. They have excellent customer service and installation was easy.

After spending two months trying to use confusing API recurring payment documentation and misrepresented claims from another major player  this app does exactly what I want.  It assumes the burden of credit card processing rules and the complexity of recurring payments.  Blake has been an exceptional resource.
Love your product and Marty is being very helpful :D

It is hard enough running the basics of a business, let alone keeping up with all the technology advances.  With boldapps and their staff however...they go above and beyond standing by you and supporting to make a win win success.  That is exactly what was done for us here at Tipcupland and we can see the difference!!!

What sets this recurring payments app apart from others is that the recurrence becomes a feature of any product you choose. This is ideal for us as we sell consumable products (moustache wax and beard oil) that are used at different speeds by different people. As always, customer service from Bold is fantastic.

I had been thinking about how to implement a subscription feature on my Shopify store, when I got the email announcing Bold Apps' Recurring Orders App.
I downloaded the App and selected the Option for Bold Apps to install the App on my Store for me. The Bold Recurring Orders App is the answer to my dream and greatly appreciate their off to install the App if I so desired.
Bold Support Wizard Scott, worked on my installation request and got it done perfectly and sent me an email to let men know that the App had been installed and was active on my store, and the best part - the installation was done for FREE! 

I am now about to promote my new store with the Recurring Orders App already installed from the start. This is fantastic, thanks to Bold Apps for releasing this great App at the right time for me, and thanks to Scott for installing it on my store!

Once again, Bold has stolen the show.  I have two Shopify stores with multiple Bold apps in each.  I've installed other recurring payment apps in the past and they didn't work.  When I would contact customer support, they would basically tell me that my products weren't what they built it for and that I was out of luck.

Now enter Bold...when I saw that they had launched their Recurring Payments app, I had to get it.  I've had nothing but good luck with their apps in the past.  After installation, there were some compatibility issues between this app and another app in my store.  The crew at Bold (Jay, Brenden, Ron, Michael, Travis) were in constant contact with me while we worked the issue until it was figured out.  Now everything is running just like I want it to.

I can't say enough good things about Bold.  Keep the great apps coming!
Awesome product, awesome people, awesome support. Highly recommended. Thanks team Bold!

First off, I do not write many reviews. It takes a special experience, either good or bad, for me to take my time to write a review.

This is one of those (very) good experiences.

The bold app support team is worthy of the cost of the app alone. hands down.

I have tried various subscription based apps, and when bold put out this new app, you bet I was going to try it. The installation process was like most other bold apps ( I have a few on my site) and requires a bit of coding knowledge. Or you can have their support team assist. Once installed, you are able to modify the look,feel, and placement of this subscription widget. In addition, customers are able to manage their subscriptions all within their same store account. (if you activated store accounts). No extra logins, BIg plus.

Now here, I did experience some concerns. My integration wasn't as smooth as I had hoped. The app ran into a few glitches in regards to the product page integration and checkout process.

The bold support team, with special shout-out to Curtis. was more than happy to help. It took a couple days to fully integrate this app within my website. Currently, there are known bugs, which i was told is on high priority and should be resolved early next week. My praise goes to the support team and their efforts. This feature to allow subscription-based ordering is an essential part of my business. Given this necessity, I am extremely picky when it comes to these type of apps. I believe I have finally chosen my app for this feature. Congrats bold team.
